name: Friday Night Funkin' vs. LSE
description:
Vs. LongestSoloEver is a Friday Night Funkin' Mod featuring YouTube guitarist LongestSoloEver, with all new original music, artwork, charting, remixes and more.

The full week features five songs, and two "mania mode" remixes.

name: Hehe
description: A 2D platformer about saving a sugar cube from tea monsters.

name: Those Darn Brothers!!!
description: 'Those Darn Brothers!' is a slice of life BL about bonding with family.

name: Five Golden Nights at Freddy's 3: Storage
description: Sin descripción

name: Red Wings: American Aces Bundle
description: Red Wings: American Aces Bundle grants you an access to a set of unique Heavy Metal and Legendary skins for several planes.

name: Sonic Heardle
description:
This is a clone of Joywave Heardle (which in turn was modeled on Heardle and K-Pop Heardle) that is focused on Sonic the Hedgehog.

Each Sonic Heardle is randomly chosen from one of several songs from the franchise - mostly the games with a few from adaptations (like the OVA or SatAM) thrown in as well.

name: Rolling Car
description:
Drive your car on the looping conveyor belt where tight platforming awaits you. Use your ride's built-in rocket jump and turbo to nimbly overcome traps. Remember, speed isn't always the best option - some situations will require patience!

Rolling Car features 30 exciting levels of increasing difficulty that will put your skills to the test! Dangerous saws, spikes, rockers or multi-level constructions requiring daring jumps - all in precisely designed riddle levels.

name: Ten Tales from the Record of the Adamant Gambit
description: This anthology of ten short slice-of-life games explores life aboard a generation starship, originally made over ten days in December 2021 for the Variety Megajam.

name: Airborne
description: Fly a small aircraft exploring an infinite world!

name: Melon Dusk
description: Play as Melon Dusk the famous billionaire who finally landed on Mars. Earn ShibaCoin to buy accessories to customize your appearance !

name: Comixxx Swap
description: Comixxx Swap is a casual game with relaxing atmosphere featuring high quality, hot & sexy girls done in comic book style. Enjoy the classic, puzzle piece swapping gameplay.

name: Puzzle: Nature
description: Puzzle: Nature - cute, colorful puzzle game. Your goal is to put the pieces of the puzzle together to make a complete, beautiful picture.

name: ...Knew the Beginning
description: A world you don't recognize anymore. You wake up inside a bar after the apocalypse. The barkeeper of said bar is in trouble. Do what you can to help him, after all he is all you remember.

name: Sporty Games
description: Fun and sport from your home! Your body is the controller, move to play alone or with friends!

name: 100 Worlds: Escape Room Game
description: Join Mia on an exciting adventure! Help her escape from inside of the magic book by solving brain-teasing logic puzzles. Explore beautiful fantasy worlds filled with spells, unearthly creatures and magic.

name: The Heart of Darkness
description: Explore the Realm of Darkness, a mysterious dungeon in the underground kingdom of Haillard. You must find the spirit of the Saint of Darkness, and unravel the truth of this strange world in this dark, turn-based RPG.

name: The Ditty of Carmeana
description:
A medieval action/adventure video game that is NOT a legend.
In this third-person action adventure, Kai will travel all over the ostensibly medieval kingdom of Bowtudgel (rhymes with "cow cudgel") in his quest to Rescue the Princess. Along the way, he will solve puzzles, make money, conquer a set dungeons that are one-to-one with the Kingdom's major biomes, help people (sort of), kill enemies (sort of), buy hats, and find future DLC sidequests that you know very well the game developers will never get around to making. Along the way, he'll discover that there might be something even bigger at stake than a missing princess....

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 1 - Episode 02
description: This DLC gives you access to Season 1 Episode 2: Nightmare on Loser Street! Before Cody can ascend to Godhood he’s gotta pass the week long Chill Assessment Test. First stop, the basement!

name: Fazbear Nights
description:
Dear new security guard, welcome back to Freddy Fazbear's Pizza!
Since the last time you were here we actually got our paychecks! Now we have brand new systems for you to use on your job! Though... we still have to pay the bills here so we're giving you a limited amount of power, use it wisely....

name: Untameable
description: Untameable (also referred to as "Untameable, Book 1") is the first book of the Untameable series. It is followed by Unbridled: An Untameable Story.

name: Crystal Wish: Bits Collection
description: Crystal Wish: Bits Collection is a collection of 6 different minigames featuring the many cute girls of Crystal Wish!

name: Return of the Slimepires
description: An action-adventure platformer where you play as a human that must get to the safety of the underground bunker. There are multiple endings depending on the path you take.

name: Defile
description: Discover the story behind the blood queen and bring an end to the evil entity which now inhabits the manor.

name: Brave New World
description: Sin descripción

name: Headless Chicken
description: Headless Chicken is a delicious variety megawad in progress where Doomguy is continuously chased by chickens and other demons, too.

name: Stasis
description: Stasis is a fangame that combines Half-Life, Team Fortress 2, and Inscryption.

name: Easter Candy Run
description: Easter Candy Run is a Runner style arcade game where the user leaps and dashes through obstacles to get to the finish line. Play and survive through 12 levels as you complete your quest as a Blue Bunny.

name: Give Up the Ghost: A Puzzle Checklist
description: Sin descripción

name: Zelda Heardle
description:
A daily Zelda music guessing game!

Each Zelda Heardle is randomly chosen from Zelda soundtracks.

name: Growing My Grandpa!
description: Growing My Grandpa! is a narrative-driven point-and-click horror game with virtual pet elements.

name: ABC Search with Me: Animal Pack
description: ABC Search with Me: Animal Pack is a collection of additional game levels featuring dozens of animals that extend the fun time in the game ABC Search with Me!

name: Lumberhill: Powerful People Pack
description: What better way to get your journey through the lands of Lumberhill off to a good start than with a skin of a powerful person? No sheep would dare defy you if you were the clever Cleopatra. What tree could fling you off a cliff if you were Superman? Ok, maybe those things would still happen, but it’s all about how you feel in a skin of a powerful person. Dress for success, right? With the 4 unique skins in the Powerful People Pack you’re sure to get the job done!

name: ABC Search With Me: Adventure Bundle
description: Do you want to go on an adventure in search of hidden words scattered around the world? Hop in the balloon and set off with our friends!

name: ABC Search with Me: Sea Animal Pack
description: Sea Animal Pack is a collection of dozens of additional game levels featuring sea animals that extend the fun time in the game ABC Search with Me!

name: ABC Search with Me: Food Pack
description: "Food Pack" is a collection of additional game levels with dozens of foods that extend the fun time in the game ABC Search with Me!

name: ABC Search with Me: Zodiac Pack
description: Zodiac Pack is a collection of dozens of additional game levels featuring zodiac symbols that extend the fun time in the game ABC Search with Me!

name: Perfect Truck Bundle
description: The perfect combination of two games, pure arcade gameplay in a world of Monster Trucks and a world without drivers. What would the world look like if you were in control of the streets?

name: Tower Defense Bundle
description: How long can you survive under the heavy pressure of the incoming attackers?

name: Puzzle Game Bundle
description: A bundle of puzzle games for the whole family! Contains the classic game Among Pipes, the relaxing Fall Gummies and the game Zoo Dentist that will teach kids to treat their pets with love and care, while at the same time protect their own teeth!

name: ABC Search with Me
description: Discover new words and learn foreign languages in a fast, easy and fun way!

name: Jim's Adventure
description:
Jim's Adventure is a game where you need to follow Jim, the Native American in an exciting and challenging adventure. He is exploring a large world filled with perils, ranging from various creatures to obstacles, all trying to stop him. There are a multitude of levels to complete and Jim has a very limited amount of lives.

Every level has its fair share of challenges, and there are multiple game worlds ranging from haunted forests to deserts, caves and many others.

name: Unsolved Riddles
description:
This bundle includes:

- 9 Clues: The Secret of Serpent Creek

- Ghost Files: Memory of a Crime

- Noir Chronicles: City of Crime

name: The Haunted: Hells Reach - The Fog
description: THE FOG - Welcome to DLC 2!The second brand new full level of THHR. The testers were excited about the brand new level and you will be too - so get the achievement "SALVAGED FOG" on all difficulty levels.

name: 3D Puzzle: Alchemist House
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.

name: Trash Pit
description: A frantic twin stick shooter where you and your enemies are only ever one hit from death. Mow down relentless waves of robots, collect upgrades and claw your way to the highest score you can.

name: Sharp Shooter Bundle: S.N.I.P.E.R Hunter Scope + Knights & Guns
description: Aim, breath, hold, squeeze - those fundamentals of marksmanship will come in handy! This bundle includes two arcade-style shooting games: - Become a hunter and fight for your freedom in S.N.I.P.E.

name: Extreme Speed Bundle: Go! Fish Go! Adrenaline Rush, Jet Ski Rush
description: Test your reflexes with three games that are all about speed! - Complete obstacle filled water courses in JetSki Rush!

name: Sunflower Land
description: Farm, Gather, Cook, Raise Animals, Fish, Craft & Trade your NFTs in this Web3 RPG based farming simulator

name: Siren's Call
description: Siren’s Call is the first "friendship simulator" where your friends can actually fight back. Make these last moments you have with them count. Say the right things...because they won't accept anything less than your absolute best. Will you reach escape velocity?

name: Little Ninja
description: You are a young 8 year old boy named Liam, you recently got a ninja mask for a birthday present! You must protect the house from evil doers! You must be sneaky, and make sure to not get caught!

name: PogoStickMiooooooon
description: An action game where you bounce up and up and up and up, just trying to get to higher. This game is hololive unofficial fangame featuring Ookami Mio.

name: Robo Wars
description:
Fight face to face with your opponent or keep your distance, it's up to you how the fight will go! Your main task is to defeat all opponents and become a duel master.

Test your skills against various opponents in all arenas!
Upgrade and change your equipment as you like - all to achieve the coveted victory!

name: Astrocat: Milky Way Journey
description: Skylar is an astronaut cat who took a lot of cool pictures of the Milky Way, but she needs to gather the pictures to send to the scientists of her planet, help her and discover lots of data and curiosity about our galaxy in this 2D puzzle.

name: Ignis Corruption
description: In this Procedural City-Building and Survival game, you must manage your resources, expand your village, assemble an army and destroy the source of evil, which changed the entire eco system of a land that was once prosperous and peaceful.

name: TukTuk
description: Fight vicious monsters and other unknown threats on a floral and foreign planet as TukTuk. Utilize your imagination on diverse, precise and intense platforming and skill your character based on your preferences on your epic mission to rescue TukTuk's Mother.

name: Arcis Ultima
description: Player finds himself in the war between human race and the invading creatures. You must train yourself, get the very best equipment, recall your past and help human efforts. Otherwise; as the time passes, you may find yourself in a hopeless situation.

name: Evil Reap
description: 4-player co-op, demon-slaying madness. Slaughter endless hordes of demons, either solo or with friends.

name: Easter Eggstravaganza
description: Developed by Lumpy Pudding Productions, Easter Eggstravaganza is a 3D Platformer that puts you in the shoes of the Easter Bunny himself. Help the Easter Bunny collect eggs, explore levels, and make his way to the end as quickly as possible.

name: The D-T.E.A.M.
description:
Dwarves. Tanks. Energy. Ammo. MMMGold!

In this 3D Tank Blaster Platformer, you will take down an enemy mining facility, all the while finding energy pickups and collecting sweet gold. Double jump, speed boost, and blast your way to earn performance stars and achieve a personal best in time!

name: Tetris: Flower Garden
description: Tetris: Flower Garden is Tetris like you've never seen before - incredibly addictive and with amazing stylistic graphics!

name: Package Inspector
description: Plunge into the dystopian land of Taxien and check packages at the local customs office! Which packages need to be sorted out? Which ones support the rebels and which ones support the state? Which side will you choose? And will you earn enough to pay your useless taxes?

name: Bishoujo Battle: Double Strike!
Sea of Dreams
description:
You wake up alone aboard the boat named the Sea of Dream. Strange things happen. Baggage everywhere, traces of blood. But no one. You are alone. Your goal is simple, find help. For this, you will have to explore the ship and solve puzzles in order to move forward. And maybe understand what happened.

Will you survive the Sea of Dreams? Find a way to escape from this dream that has turned into a nightmare.

name: The Hidden Ghost
description: The Hidden Ghost is a casual-survival game where you as a ghost must not be caught by the guards.

name: Fireteam
description: A free to play FPS game brought to you by Ryan Laley Games. Shoot your weapons and throw your grenades to take down your opposition. Welcome to Fireteam soldier!

name: Capture Creatures
description: Welcome to the Capture Mansion, home of Capture Creatures. Here you can fill your collection and explore the mansion, all while risking your deck. No matter how skilled you are, there's a place for you in the Capture Mansion. Remember, whether you win or lose, just try to have fun!

name: Goddess of War Essa
description: Goddess Of War Essa is a vertical scrolling flying shooter. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the air.

name: Reef Rivals
description: Prepare yourself for the hottest pool party of 2022! Slip into your best costume, grab your friends and fight for the trophy in many different chaotic levels!

name: A.R.D. Alien Removal Division
description: Alien Removal Division is a fast paced, action-packed first-person shooter, set in a military research facility during the 1950s. The base has been overrun by aliens and you find yourself, as the only survivor, at the center of the invasion. Your escape will be challenging, but you'll have an array of weapons and movement abilities to help you during your fight and on your getaway.

name: Blow & Fly
description: Fulfill your wildest dreams: become a blowfish that traverses the world by rolling on the floor! Take a deep breath, aim at your target and blow all the water out of your puny body to propel yourself in the air!

name: Light: Black Cat & Amnesia Girl
description: "Light" is a 3D adventure puzzle game, in which you play as a cat. You will help a little girl who has lost her memory escape by leading her through four-level mazes with different style.

name: Lab Remnants
description: Lab Remnants is a monochromatic roguelike full of secrets and challenges. Play as an artificially made creature and make your way through your own creators to escape from their crazy experiments.

name: Fractured
description: Fractured is a side scroll action game focused on boss battles. As the hero, you take on different boss fights from underground monsters to fighting dragons. Learn from each fight to gain to skill necessary to take down epic monsters.

name: Polycalypse: Last Bit of Hope
description: Survive the zombie apocalypse by yourself or with your friends in this low poly post apocalyptic world. Survive, build your base and fight the zombies. But beware, you aren't the only one trying to survive. There are other survivors in proceduraly generated bases that will shoot you on sight!

name: Russian Prison Tattoo Simulator
description: Become a tattoo artist in Russian Prison. Get introduced to tattoo iconography and special meanings of Russian Prison tattoos

name: The Scorchfarer
description: A scarred kingdom, a mourning god and an unfulfilled promise made with the past. Uzu and Zuhaar, two continents ravaged by a cosmic event are the setting of The Scorchfarer. The story follows Mikaela and Yukiharu, a Terramagus team tasked with healing their world and unraveling its secrets.

name: Animal Warfare Battle Simulator
description: Pitch all kinds of animals against each other in this funny physics-based tactical simulator! Watch a bunch of rhinos bulldoze through little warthogs, a T-Rex grabbing a buffalo in its jaw or an elephant throw a tiger into the air with its huge tusks! Let your imagination run wild!

name: Fox Soldier
description: Fox Soldier is a 3D shooting action game launched by Yousoi Co.,Ltd. It is specially developed for game consoles and mainframes. It adopts full-view mode. As a warrior of the Queen of the planet of Metis, in order to get the Queen's love, you must go through difficult battles, conquer the world, and destroy monsters and...

name: Once Ever After
description: Red Riding Hood wanders out of the woods... and into an infinite number of alternate dimensions twisting the classic fairy tale in countless ways.

name: Aurum
description: The world of AURUM has been shaken. Thieves from hell stole the treasures of the three wolf gods. Now the world is facing a huge chaos and you as a traveler must help the gods to find and collect all the treasures.

name: The King of Fighters XV: DLC Costume "Classic Leona"
description:
[Product Contents]
- Leona Heidern Costume for THE KING OF FIGHTERS XV
Leona Heidern's costume can be changed to the costume she wore in "KOF '96".

name: Nefarious Dreams
description:
Nefarious Dreams is a game that has Mario navigating a brand-new semi-linear set of 25 levels, boasting new graphics, enemy behaviour and environments plus some minor audio changes. It’s sure to keep both inexperienced and well-versed Mario players engaged as they try to puzzle out the path to the ending and find every secret level.

Oh yeah… and Mario goes to space. That is pretty cool.

name: The King of Fighters XV: Omega Rugal
description: Free DLC Character OMEGA RUGAL joins, THE KING OF FIGHTERS XV!

name: King of Fighters XV: Garou MotW Terry Costume
description: Sin descripción

name: Her Little Sylvietower
description: A platformer by Sylvie in which you climb to the top of a tower. You can rewind time, to avoid death or fix mistakes.

name: 3 Islands of Shells
description: Sin descripción

name: Not Evil Sudoku
description: A minimalistic IOS sudoku game with daily challenges and no ads.

name: Danganronpa: Lapse
description:
10 students find themselves trapped in a luxurious mansion and soon discover there is only one requirement for escape — to kill each other.

Follow the story through Echo Pine’s eyes, unraveling the secrets of their enclosure and the secrets of their fellow students.

Danganronpa: Lapse is a not-for-profit project based on the series Danganronpa, by Kazutaka Kodaka, and bears no affiliation with Spike Chunsoft.

name: Chunithm New Plus
description: The 14th version of the famous Sega rhythm game. Including brand new songs and gameplay features.

name: Skullgirls: 2nd Encore - Umbrella
description: The saltiest sibling in the Canopy Kingdom (and her insatiable monstrosity Hungern) have at long last joined the Skullgirls roster!

name: Gotta Protectors: Cart of Darkness DLC Bundle Packs 1-4
description: This is a bundle of the four DLC packs available for Gotta Protectors: Cart of Darkness. This bundle is for those who already own the base game.

name: The Darkside Detective: A Fumble in the Dark - One Flew Into the Cuckoo's Nest
description: Buzz is missing! Head to the Twin Lakes Botanical Gardens to get to the bottom of this here mystery! Based off the Darkside choose-your-own adventure from Twitter last year, you can check out the trailer just down below

name: Bus Simulator 21: Easter Interior Pack
description: Easter is here, it’s time to put all the eggs in one basket! With this Easter themed unique interior pack, you can fully embrace this colourful holiday. Customise your bus and make it your own.

name: Bus Simulator 21: Easter Skin Pack
description: Easter is here, it’s time to put all the eggs in one basket! With this collection of 10 Easter themed unique bus skins, you can fully embrace this colourful holiday wherever you drive.

name: Crowd Evolution!
description: In Crowd Evolution, you can grow and evolve your crowd and beat the enemies!

name: Wario's Wonderful Walk
description:
Welcome to the creator's third hack, which features:

- 10 Exits
- custom music
- custom graphics
- some costum blocks
- some costum sprites
- QoL patches

name: Fuck Putin
description: In February 2022, Russia invaded Ukraine. This event shocked the whole world. Unjustified aggression must be condemned, and the president of Russia, Vladimir Putin - punished.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Scarlet Devil Land Arrange Song Pack Vol.2
description:
"Scarlet Devil Land Arrange Pack Vol.2”, a collection of popular arrangement tracks is here.
Featuring classics like “sweet little sister” and the much talked about “Scarlet Police on Ghetto Patrol 24PM”, this pack is filled with songs just as popular as those included in Phase 1.

name: Polda 7
description: It´s the seventh entry in the point and click adventure series Polda. Gameplay-wise Polda 7 does not differ from previous entries, however for the first time in the series history there is also a secondary controlable character. Just like previous Polda games, this one is also heavy focused on situational humor.

name: Gotta Protectors: Cart of Darkness - Ultimate Deluxe Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Gotta Protectors: Cart of Darkness DLC Pack 4
description: Sin descripción

name: Gotta Protectors: Cart of Darkness DLC Pack 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Gotta Protectors: Cart of Darkness DLC Pack 2
description: This DLC includes new music, 20 additional campaign stages as part of the Bonus Scenario B story, plus new skills for the Ninja and Oracle characters!

name: Gotta Protectors: Cart of Darkness DLC Pack 1
description: This DLC includes new music, 20 additional campaign stages as part of the Bonus Scenario A story, plus new skills for the Fighter and Archer characters!

name: Puppet Boss
description:
"Good morning, ma'am. Let me escort you to your office."

I thought I walked into my office, but what am I doing in this pervert house?!

Four people with unusual fetishes that appeared in front of me, who became the figurehead of a men's clothing company.

I did ""it"" tonight, then the next day,... then in the night again. Are we really allowed to do this all day?

name: No Senses
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixel Game Maker Series Dandan Z
description: The sixth installment in the fictional "Game Buddy" portable game console series! Play against a total of 10 characters!

name: Simulator XL Bundle
description: Big Simulator bundle with 5 games in 1!

name: Arcade Archives: The Legend Of Valkyrie
description: The Legend Of Valkyrie is an action game released by Namco in 1989. Valkyrie No Bouken features the popular Valkyrie once again, for an even higher-power adventure! When the seeds of gold are watered by the northern spring, a miracle will spring forth in the doomed land.

name: Demon Turf: Neon Splash
description: Demon Turf is back and better than ever! Join Beebz in this neon lit adventure where speedy platforming reigns supreme!

name: S-In
description: Easy and relaxing puzzle game to play. The player's goal is to do whatever they can to reach the green goal to pass all the levels.

name: Air Hockey Puzzles
description: Meet new puzzle game. Air hockey puzzles is new perspective of classic arcade game.

name: Moorhuhn Jump and Run: Traps and Treasures 2
description: Moorhuhn 'Traps and Treasures 2' for Nintendo Switch brings 21 challenging levels + 6 bonus levels full of dangerous traps, devious enemies and hidden treasures!

name: Gotta Protectors: Cart of Darkness
description: Protect the Princess, Smash Castles, and Pulverize Foes. Will You Be the First to Collect All 948 Game Carts?

name: Pinball Freedom
description: Grab your walk-man, and take a trip to your favourite arcade with our classic retro Pinball machines.

name: College Kings 2: Act I
description: College Kings 2 is the highly anticipated sequel to the popular choice-driven Adult Visual Novel. Dive into a world of parties, sex and love as a college freshman and make your wildest fantasies come true.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Oma2ri Adventure
description: The Ultimate Speedrun Platformer!! On to an adventure to rescue Momo-chan!

name: Alice
description: Alice is a survival horror set in a Japanese construction site. Aim to escape from the construction site while escaping from the urban legendary woman.

name: Elevated
description: Elevated is a multiplayer (8 vs. 1) thriller action game where eight death row inmates try to complete the given tasks to gain their freedom while being chased by the 4th horseman of the apocalypse, "The Death".

name: S-In
description: Easy and relaxing puzzle game to play.

name: Run N' Gun
description: Skate and shoot your way through waves of enemies increasing your firepower along the way to become the champion. Run N' Gun is a First-person arcade shooter with a focus on movement. Become the Protagonist Bot and use your skills to survive waves of Antagonist Bots to win it all.

name: Solasta: Crown of the Magister - Lost Valley
description: Escape from Lost Valley in this brand new level 1 to 12 campaign that will take your new party into the long forgotten lands of the Dominion. Ruled with an iron fist by the tyrant Orenetis, your arrival will light a fuse under this political powder keg!

name: Fruit Bonanza
description: Fruit Bonanza is an endless runner game in which the goal is to score the highest number of points. Various obstacles will hinder us in this

name: Lulu's Temple
description: Lulu’s Temple is a mysterious retro dungeon crawler about an archeologist venturing deep inside a horrifying pyramid with only his torch and gun to protect him.

name: Rocket Mania
description: Take control of a small rocket as you fly from launch to landing pad throughout 90 levels avoiding all the obstacles along the way!

name: Moonstuck
description: Relaxing rage game in a cutesy wholesome Moonstuck land. Delicate jump-balancing rage platformer where your job is to escape, while staying relaxed.

name: Sisters Possession 1
description: Sisters Possession Is Srpg. By possessing a girl, we will advance the battle to the advantage.

name: Shooting Star Island
description: Shooting Star Island is a big and colorful 3d platformer. Stanky Star will rekindle his powers throughout his journey to the comet's depths, where lost worlds slumber and the Muses of the End sing their songs of destruction.

name: Auto Kingdom Crunch
description: Pick the best team, level up your units and battle other players in this relaxed auto-battler. Can you get 10 wins?

name: Tape: Unveil the Memories
description: Iria, a girl from the small town of Antumbria, receives a VHS tape from her father asking for help. From this message, Iria will dive into her memories, where she will have to use her father's old video camera to explore her memory and discover her family's dark secrets.

name: Rogue Ascent
description: Rogue Ascent VR is an upcoming experimental Procedurally-Generated Sci-Fi Shooter controlled seamlessly by Oculus hand-tracking technology. Discover and combine countless weapons types, attachment modifications, abilities, gadgets, perks, and powerups as you blast and beguile past teams of formidable foes. The completed gameplay experience will feature many added items, secrets, perks, abilities, enemy types, game modes, bosses, biomes, achievements, and competitive online leaderboards for you to challenge your friends (or rivals!).

name: AgriLife
description: Between turn-based management and farming game, AgriLife puts you in the shoes of a farmer. Plant your crops in a living soil, move on to the next week and watch their evolution! Master this little world, try several strategies… or just enjoy the sunshine and birdsongs.

name: Siege of Treboulain
description: Defend your magical city from an enemy army in an epic fantasy game of swordfights, political maneuvering, and romance! Will you prove worthy of your crown?

name: The Oathkeeper
description: Ira is a famed mercenary, called The Oathkeeper. When one of his contracts puts him in the middle of an ancient war of good v. evil and face to face with the woman he begins to fall in love with, he will have to start fighting for more than just money!

name: Athanasy
description: Deep beneath the surface of the dead Earth, the City, the last refuge of humanity, hides. Engineering genius and efforts of all mankind; a giant structure of steel, concrete, and biopolymers. It keeps the remnants of civilization one step away from total extinction.

name: Suhoshin
description: Suhoshin is a 2D Visual Novel taking place during medieval Korea. While investigating mysterious murders, you will have to make interactive choices that will lead you to different paths and endings.

name: Crimesight
description: In Crimesight investigators will work with an AI called “Sherlock” to prevent a future murder cooked up by another AI known as “Moriarty.” However, there is a traitor in their midst, secretly helping the Moriarty AI. Players will have to decide who they can trust as they try to deduce the truth.

name: Battle Spirits: Connected Battlers
description: Battle Spirits Connected Butlers is a game where you can play the trading card game Battle Spirits.

name: Run: The World In-Between
description: In a place where everything is constantly moving, you will have to face the dangers of the World In-Between to reach for the light. Dodge the most devious traps while relying on your reflexes, hoping for a better future.

name: Cat Cafe Manager
description: In this business management sim you build and manage your own cat cafe, adopt stray cats, and befriend the locals! Collect cafe furniture and food recipes to make your customers feel at home, then use your collection of unique cats to delight them.

name: FurryFury: Smash & Roll
description: A dynamic beast-rolling physics-based online arena brawl.

name: The Wonder Sword
description: The Wonder Sword is a Smart Book. A chose your adventure book and game experience. YOU are the hero in the story and chose your path through the story, illustrations can be scanned with the app connecting the story with the game elements

name: The Mist
description: Sin descripción

name: Secrets After Class
description: My high school Japanese teacher has a secret, he's a popular novelist in a literature department. Mr. Kangyong will deepen his relationship with a certain person in exchange for keeping his secret of being a novelist, even though the shadow of a relationship stares at the two of them.

name: Warbl
description: Warbl is a daily guessing game where players are presented with a song played in reverse, and must guess the correct song within six attempts. Each incorrect guess will reveal information about the artist, genre, and decade of the song's release.

name: Visual Pinball X
description: Visual Pinball X is an open source freeware pinball game for PC.

name: Temple of Teuthis v1
description: Large dark underwater base / temple adventure map with lots of exploration. Textures by Makkon, built on extras_r5 mod by Khreathor (already included) with features like ladders. Make sure to save often, and save powerups until you really need them.

name: SCP 087 B
description: An SCP-087 remake, which involves a seemingly endless set of descending stairs.

name: A Knight in the Attic
description: Pull open the latch to a dusty old attic and find curiosity and adventure waiting for you on a table in the corner. What starts as playfully guiding Guinevere through a labyrinth board quickly turns into a sprawling, puzzle-solving, VR adventure.

name: No Man's Sky: Outlaws
description: Become an interstellar rebel in Update 3.85, Outlaws! Introducing outlaw systems; the ability to recruit your own squadron of pilots; improved space combat; a stunning Solar Sail Starship, and much more!

name: 2-taku de Bishoujo Game
description:
A quiz game that advances the story with 2 choices!
If you make a mistake, you will end up with a bad end, so be careful!

name: Rainbow Dash Tylenol
description: Rainbow Dash and Boyfriend singing Rainbow Tylenol, that's all.

name: Nauka Prediel
description: A sovietic detective narrative game based on 1970s. You can interact and inspect objects and there are multiple endings.

name: Steaming Penguins
description:
You are in charge of a ragtag group of penguins castaway on the open ocean. With dangers lurking from every corner it is your mission to build a tower to help defend and increase the number of your inhabitants!
Strategy is critical as lower floors will be destroyed by your enemies given enough time, requiring you to quickly adapt to an ever changing situation. Once you have collected enough resources you can evacuate as many penguins as possible on air ships before you are overrun!

name: R Place Guesser
description:
You get 8 seconds to look at a small part of the image.
Then you need to locate that image.
Repeat this for 5 rounds.
Points will be given depending on you accuracy, speed and difficulty.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 17
description: A new weapon, the return to Sanhok's former glory, new items hitting ranked games and more in Season 17 of PUBG: Battlegrounds!

name: Bacteriophage
description: Bacteriophage Roguelike Platformer takes place inside the body of someone with many bacterial infections. You play as a cyborg named Terri (“like bacteria”), with a gun that shoots bacteriophage DNA-infused bullets. Your job is to make your way through this human body and destroy any and all bacteria and infections that stand in your way.

name: Crime Сity
description: Love fun and endless fun? Do you like cool games with a beautiful world and beautiful graphics? Then Crime City is for you! Immerse yourself in the role of a city criminal who is hunted by absolutely the whole city. car and different weapons do not let yourself be offended !!!

name: Escape from Deathmark Dungeon
description: Will you escape Deathmark Dungeon? Or will you remain trapped within like all those who went before you?Fight your way through seven levels of dark dungeons, bashing and smashing all the enemies who stand before you.Take up sword and spell to slice and zap your enemies.

name: Lucky Gem
description: On the mysterious island of Omda lives a group of Omda people who make a living by collecting the island's rich variety of fruits. They collect a lot of fruit every day, but only a small part is used for food, and most of them are exchanged for gold coins.

name: Save the School Flower Action
description: One day, the campus flower of XX University spent a night. When she opened her eyes, she found herself on a strange military base. She was looking about for her way home. All I can see are mutants walking around outside. And then, somehow, you were transported here,

name: Corn Defenders
description: A modern game inspired by many popular 1980s arcade games that depicts a student locked inside of a school. You will need to trade for and collect corn to escape. You will also need to run away from Dr. Small and the teachers

name: Merge Cats: Idle Game
description: Merge Cats - Idle Game is a classic and simple merging game. The game is simple and relaxing - merge cats of the same level and unlock new cats! You can make your own collection of cute cats. Which cat is the cutest?

name: Hidden Harbor Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Escape: Lia
description: Lia, an 8-year old child got trapped in someone's dark basement. What secrets are hidden in this basement? Discover suspicious items, follow clues, and solve puzzles. Will you be able to escape safely?

name: Quad Dice Defence
description: This is a tower defense game where you use four dice to build a turret. The rolls of the dice are the ability value of "number of shots", "time reload", "damage(& range)" and "magazine". Try your best to clear all 40 stages, which are getting more and more difficult!

name: Pad of Time
description: It's time to play a 2.5D retro-style platformer... With a twist!

name: Friendsim 2
description: In this episodic visual novel, follow the adventures of MSPA Reader as they return to Alternia once more to save their friends... and realize that nothing is as it seems.

name: Life of Pepe
description: Explore, craft, and fight in this minimalist survival game. Play alone or with a friend!

name: Regular Factory: Escape Room
description: You don't work in a regular assembly line. In this escape room, you will investigate what is really being manufactured in a secret factory, explore mysterious places and solve puzzles. Will you unravel the truth?

name: Lumencraft
description: Desperate, outnumbered and with gun turrets as your only companion. Lumencraft is a top-down shooter with base-building elements. Drill through fully destructible environment to reach precious resources, and spend them on weapons and tools protecting the last bastion of humanity.

name: Car Detailing Simulator
description: In Car Detailing Simulator, you have the chance to renew and restore shine to any car, commissioned by demanding customers! A good and well-kept car can be the pride of every car owner! Clean, polish and admire your car creations in this highly realistic game where every detail counts!

name: Trackwars
description: Jump in to an Action packed Role Playing game living in 2056, explore the whole city, and get money by doing jobs. If you wanna be the best in the city you need almost everything, every cars, guns, even apartments! This is the city with bunch of bad guys, explore the future with Trackwars.

name: BorderCollie Blaster
description: Kira is back! In this arcade style shoot ´em up you´ll encounter different foes, defeat big alien bosses and collect power-ups and new weapons to fight your way through exciting stages and find the holy bone Kira (the star of the game) is looking for.

name: Maritime Calling
description: Maritime Calling is a narrative-driven RPG in which you lead a daring expedition into the New World. Survive the life at sea, assign sailors to various jobs, fight naval battles, lead island expeditions and break the Empire's hold over the New World in an enchanting seafaring adventure.

name: Mechanic 8230
description: Mechanic 8230 is an adventure game in the genre of Point-and-click. Help Mechanic find his robot friend RO-2 and unveil secrets about this destroyed world.

name: Shy Eye Labyrinth: The Incredible Mystery
description:
As a new poor soul trapped in the mysterious labyrinth of the Shy Eye, you are trying to find your way out.
By solving puzzles, you gain keys which unlock new parts of the labyrinth and hopefully the way out of this prison.

Find your way to high places, interact with the world and find secrets hidden in the labyrinth.

By exploring the world you’ll come across skeletons and souls of previous adventurers, who did not make the way out, but will reveal some important information about the labyrinth to you.

Completing levels grants you the option to try your best in time challenges, which will prove if you are worthy to the Shy Eye.

Can you find your way out and solve the incredible mystery of the Shy Eye labyrinth?

name: The Lair of Nekro Neko
description:
Game made for Black and White Jam #8 (Theme: Loop)

In this game you are Salem, a cat trapped in a time loop that will only be undone when he defeats the Machiavellian sorcerer Nekro Neko and saves his friends. For this, Salem will need to face evil creatures that increase his time inside the loop.

The more time he has, the more he will be able to explore the village and get more equipment to face the necromancer cat, but he will have to be careful as his time inside the loop is reduced when being attacked.

name: Danganronpa: Abandoned Lights
description:
14 former students get called back to their school that they used to go.

But as they go there, things escalate pretty quickly.

name: Power On: Energy Flow
description: Feel the electricity in your own hands playing “Power On”. Rotate the wires to ensure proper power sources can reach the lamps.

name: Minion Masters: Frost Dragon's Lair
description:
Frost Dragon’s Lair DLC is a great +300% value bundle that gives you what you need to build your own Stoutheart deck, including the legendary Scott the Sensitive Savage! It also gives you a headstart in this month’s Season Pass.

Includes:
- 3x Scott the Sensitive Savage (SaltyBarbarian) (Legendary)
- 5x Mountain Gale (Supreme)
- 20x Log Tosser (HighlandLogger)
- 40x Frostfeathers (Owl)
- 40x Woodsman
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 3x Season Pass Tiers

Stoutheart love to fight almost as much as they love to party. Play two Stoutheart minions close to each other to trigger the Revelry mechanic, and the fun-loving mountain folk will back each other up in various ways! You can even use Mountain Gale to speed up your Stouthearts and gain more Revelry while your Frostfeathers swoop in and slow down your opponents.

name: I'm On a Watcher Duty 3: The Invasion
description: Another sequel of "I'm on a watcher duty" series. This one is in the theme of the hand-made maps made by Paulor94. Enjoy.

name: Horror Tale 1: Kidnapper
description: Start a scary adventure and be the first to solve all the mysteries of this horror game!

name: HiQ Ace Deluxe
description:
Deluxe edition contains all 192 previously released levels.

In the puzzle race become the HiQ Ace.
Enjoy the high quality classic jigsaw puzzle game with the arcade twist.
Master your mind and sharpen your eyes to be the jigsaw puzzle master - the HiQ Ace.
Unlock two additional game modes. In Relax Mode there are only puzzle pieces and you. If you seek more challenge, then pick the Expert mode.
Discover dozens of beautiful high definition puzzle boards. Play fast to unlock the power-ups and beat the clock.

name: Anno 1800: Cosmetic Pack Bundle
description: Get the new Anno 1800 Cosmetic Pack Bundle and use the first six Cosmetic DLCs to decorate your city as you wish!

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Newfound Adventure
description: Patch 6.1 follows the Warrior of Light's first steps on a new journey after claiming victory in the battle for the fate of the star. This patch also features the first installment in the new alliance raid series, Myths of the Realm, which delves into the mysteries surrounding the Twelve. A host of other additions includes the new Crystalline Conflict PvP content, the Duty Support system, and more.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Ultrasclash V
description: UltrasClash V is a sandbox anime action game, designed and primed to bring you a unique and creative approach to being a hero and unleash all your super powers!

name: Aftonbuilt
description:
Aftonbuilt was a dark new take on the Five Nights at Freddy's franchise.

The player is tasked with surviving four of the most harrowing locations in Fazbear history using only their wits, movement, and a set of handmade tools. Using these, the player will have to fight back, striking back against the monsters that hunt them using traps and the environment to corner and scrap them. All the while exploring these locations for the secrets that lay just beneath the surface.

name: Eyeland
description: Welcome to EYELAND — a small "wander-around-&-figure-it-out" game by Ron Lent. Made with PULP for the Playdate game device by Panic.

name: Ribbit Rabbit
description: Help Ribby catch yummy carrot-flies for his lunch across 40 fun levels of ever more devious puzzles! Encounter traps, mazes, and monsters across four zones!

name: Anno 1800: Complete Edition Year 4
description:
Unlock the entire Anno 1800 experience with the Complete Edition Year 4, which includes the following digital content:

Season 1 Pass with three DLCs: Sunken Treasures, Botanica, and The Passage.
Season 2 Pass with three DLCs: Seat of Power, Bright Harvest, and Land of Lions.
Season 3 Pass with three DLCs: Docklands, Tourist Season, and The High Life.
Season 4 Pass, which includes the next three DLCs: Seeds of Change, Empire of the Skies, and New World Rising.
The Deluxe Pack, containing the Anarchist AI character, the soundtrack, a digital art book, and more!

name: Anno 1800: Gold Edition Year 4
description: Improve your experience in Anno 1800 with the Gold Edition Year 4, including the Season 4 Pass and the Deluxe Pack.

name: Planet Zoo: Wetlands Animal Pack
description: Where there is water, there is life! Discover the richness of the wetlands with the Planet Zoo: Wetlands Animal Pack and embrace eight diverse new species.

name: Expeditions: Rome - Death or Glory
description: Don the armour of a Gladiator and enter the arena to win fame and fortune in ‘Death or Glory!’ Play with the new Gladiator character class as you tackle 3 new arenas either during the campaign or in the brand-new Gladiator mode.

name: Back 4 Blood: Tunnels of Terror
description: Tunnels of Terror features the all-new PvE areas “Ridden Hives”, along with 2 new playable Cleaners, new Legendary Weapons, 12 weapon skins, new cards, 8 premium skins, and the fearsome Warped Ridden to discover below the depths of Evansburgh.

name: My Naughty Shotgun
description: Shoot bloody demons and giant penises with your extremely Naughty naked shotgun in this fast paced doom-like FPS!

name: Anno 1800: Seeds of Change
description:
The 1st DLC of the Anno 1800 Season 4 Pass.

Be part of the new world’s agricultural boom with the modular haciendas and face the challenges of a new scenario.

name: Happi Basudei
description: Sin descripción

name: Hard Ball Wikie
description: HARD BALL WIKIE is a two-dimensional platform game. The game contains various dangers waiting for you.

name: Winter and People
description: Winter and People mix tower defense and city building genres with its minimal style; It is a tower defense game where you try to survive in cold cities.

name: Retro Three Kingdoms: Special edition
description: We made the fun of MMORPG, the fun of hack and slash, and the fun of MOBA. We will do our best to become a game that records the history that players write. We do not provide auto-combat.

name: Lust Academy: Season 1
description: Lust Academy is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel about adventures and studying in the school of magic and wizardry. Play as a young guy who got invited to Cordale Academy. The whole world full of sorcery and passion awaits you!

name: Comrade Quack
description: Comrade Quack is a fun, hybrid, third person tower defense game aimed at young adult audiences! Play as Comrade Quack to defend the Mother Pond from filthy Capitalist Pigs with an array of combat turrets, barriers, and more!

name: Arcade Squad
description: Arcade Squad is a classic arcade shooter with 15 levels and 6 different spaceships, each with 6 different skins. Rise to the challenge and free the galaxy.

name: Dungeon & Burglar
description: The player can only move. Sneak through traps on different floors to get treasures in this thrilling and action-packed game! Find the best way to conquer each of the 30 dungeon floors by observing enemy movements!

name: The Lost Oregon City Gold
description: Find secret treasure at the end of the Oregon Trail!

name: All Quiet Roads 4743
description: A clean and simple city road builder where busy roads turn red. Your job is to add roads that may prevent waiting vehicles from overflowing your neighborhoods.

name: Annie and the Art Gallery
description: After months of waiting, Annie finally snags a ticket to the new art exhibit. However, things take a turn for the worst: she finds herself trapped in the museum's haunted basement. Help her navigate puzzles, traps, and more as she tries to escape - and find out the truth of what's really going on.

name: Sky on Fire: 1940
description: Battle of britain/france simulator

name: Biota
description: Biota is a 2D metroidvania inspired shooter set on a wild and dangerous sci-fi, pixel-art planet. Get ready to face hostile alien life forms and investigate a mysterious mining colony as a group of ragtag heroes from the future, all in glorious 4-color palettes and detailed 8-bit visuals.

name: Epiphany City
description: Epiphany City is a mind-bending puzzle adventure game where you use magical picture frames to manipulate the world around you. Turn paintings to life, change time, & re-imagine objects to suit your needs. Follow Lily, a girl who’s lost all hope, as she steals powers from the strongest superhero, leaving it up to her to save the world.

name: Sephonie
description: In this story-driven 3D platformer, explore Sephonie Island's massive cave network, and link with unidentified species using the novel Puzzle Grid system. Explore the island's depths as shipwrecked biologists Amy, Ing-wen, and Riyou, whose personal histories come to bear on the shifting spiritual landscape of the island depths.

name: Grand Theft Auto V
description: A new generation of Grand Theft Auto V featuring a range of technical improvements, visual upgrades and performance enhancements to take full advantage of the latest hardware, making the game more beautiful and more responsive than ever.

name: Film Morbid
description:
You wake up in a small and messy room. There's a storm raging outside, with the lightning illuminating a projector in the middle of the room. You investigate the projector, which surprisingly is still equipped with a film reel. You get it going, but you're not sure if that was the best decision...

Do you have what it takes to escape the room and it's looping projector?

Film Morbid is a game made by Point Vertex, during the 8th Black & White game jam. The development of the main game took 10 days.

name: Shining Star
description: Have fun with different clothes to customize, Shining Star brings a relaxing and super aesthetic atmosphere where you can decorate your characters with the most diverse items, from the cutest to the most stylish!

name: Poppy It! Playtime
description: Complete all the Poppy Pop It toys to escape from the factory! Do them all before the time limit.

name: Tailbound
description:
Tailbound is a lewd top-down 2D hack n' slash game. The game features Zelda-like gameplay, but at a far faster pace and with more of a focus on abilities and level hazards. Gameplay is based around an improved version of Thirstchasm's topple system & combat.

The game has 29 fully-animated Sex Scenes, with the sole focus of Male on Male content. Not to mention, 4 levels, 7 enemies, and a multitude of secrets, easter eggs, and lore scattered about.

name: Disposition
description: Race along a coastline as strange hostile entities chase you down. Try to reach your destination as fast as you can but don't lose control. Disposition is an attempt to combine racing with horror elements.

name: My Jurassic Darling
description:
After years of planning and research, the day you've been waiting for has finally arrived! The machine is ready, and the fossils of a T-rex, a Triceratops, and a Stegosaurus are prepped—all that's left is to bring the dinosaurs back to life, and then the girl you've been crushing on will have to acknowledge you…

That is until an earthquake knocks your idol figurine collection into the machine, and you find yourself facing not a trio of prehistoric animals, but three beautiful women in frilly costumes with strange reptilian features…

Now your only course of action is to disguise them as an idol group called the Dino Divas while you search for a way to change them into actual dinosaurs… But when you realize just how much heart and soul these girls have, can you really take away their humanity?

name: WWE 2K22: Undertaker Immortal Pack
description:
WHEN IT'S YOUR YARD IT HITS DIFFERENT
Lay down chokeslams as The Deadman. The WWE 2K22 Undertaker Immortal Pack includes three additional Undertaker personas, MyFACTION EVO Cards for Undertaker, plus MyFACTION Perks and Bonuses.

name: Upload Simulator
description: A incremental game about downloading files, uploading, and upgrading your setup. This is the official PC version of Upload Simulator.

name: Solitaire Story 3
description: The solitaire journey continues! The wanderlusting fox is going to new exotic places, including Bali, Tanzania or Cambodia. Play card solitaire games free online, visit world-famous landmarks and gather lots of collectible cards and stickers. Solitaire tripeaks is the higher or lower card game, which makes it one of the most popular types of patience. The puzzle has a number of new features compared to the previous version. These are 3 types of collectibles, progressive daily bonus and new special cards on the board.

name: Kirby Heardle
description:
A clone of Heardle, and K-Pop Heardle but for Kirby songs.

Each Kirby Heardle is randomly chosen from Kirby's Soundtracks Library (Owned by HAL Laboratory)

Majority songs were chosen from mainline games, while the selective few are from sidegame titles.

name: Pokémon Gold and Silver 97: Reforged
description: Gold and Silver 97: Reforged is a totally new re-imagining of the world from the 1997 Spaceworld demo of Pokémon Gold and Silver. Featuring an entirely new campaign and story through the Nihon Region based on all of Japan. Graphics have been totally overhauled to match the look and feel of the final 1999 release of Pokémon GSC, and gameplay spruced up with lots of entirely new content and places to explore.

name: Make a Friend
description:
Meet Nathan, a lonesome middle-schooler who's been given a seven-step ritual guaranteed to make friends. If the man in the cream suit is to be believed, it only takes some clay, some candles, and a small mammal. The only catch: he has to find those things in his own room.

Collect the ritual ingredients throughout the room. You may have to make a substitution here or there.
Perform the steps within the interactive desk interface.
Decide the fate of this house. There are seven steps, but there is only one choice...
...will you make a friend?

name: Puppetmaker
description: A 3D first Person Horror Game which takes place in an old dusty house. You are trapped in the house together with an old mysterious Puppetmaker. The key is to be as silent as possible and escape the house by solving puzzles with logic, without being caught by him. Everything you do or move could be heard by the Puppetmaker, so be aware!

name: Neko Secret: Homecoming
description: When you were traveling around the world, someone told you about an anime factory located in some Neko Town. Now this is your way. Perhaps the anime begins here. Is this your place?

name: Star Route
description: The arcade videogame and a bit tangled brain teaser. Portals, stars, space and the void. You are a traveler through the galactic star route. Can you track the way of your spaceship through the dangerous obstacles in the blank space? What are you faster than? Light? Sound? Turtle? Good luck on your journey.

name: Trails of Illusion
description: This is a JRPG free-to-play fan game with reference to the Falcom Trails series, and the battle mode is turn-based combat.

name: Hentai Uni
description: Hentai Uni - a puzzle game that can be played with one hand.

name: WarLords
description: Save the World by destroying it? Gather your squad and "put things in order"!

name: Mad Murder's Mystery Pie Shop
description: FPS game involving finding ingredients and throwing them in the oven. Then bringing cooked pies to customers of Mad Murders Pie shop.

name: Medusa Frontier
description: A science fiction themed sandbox game with base building and elements of open world survival craft.

name: Nightly Maintenance
description: Nightly Maintenance is a psychological horror hidden object game. Play as Malcom, the maintenance worker, tasked with completing 3 tasks each night in a creepy, abandoned factory. Beware the watchful eyes of an oversized mannequin.

name: Riddle of the Mask
description: Seek out the rarest masks for the countess! Become a real detective of the "Ancien Régime" and visit renowned carnivals to form a collection of unique masks.

name: Double Shot Gals
description:
Step right up! After a hard and busy week, tonight was supposed to be a fun night in the fairgrounds of Paradise Park.

However, things don't always go according to plan, so here begins this bizarre and sexy story! Complete with small narrative scenes, Double Shot Gals focuses on ecchi themed carnival adventure with arcade gameplay to create hilarious and sexy experiences.

Unlock prizes including new skins and artwork.

name: Poop Collector
description:
The world is overflowing with Poop! You are summoned to help and collect it all!
This game has 32 levels, each one has a countdown of only few seconds to clear and collect all of the scat laying around. A simple platformer made with PICO-8 where all you need to do is move left and right and jump from the start point to the exit door after everything is collected.

name: Lustful Ponies
description: Short Adult-Only Visual Novel featuring 3 girls with different personalities and fetishes.

name: Ib
description: Ib is a remake of the original 2D exploration adventure game, featuring new puzzles and graphics, a new soundtrack, many improvements, and more.

name: Neon Flash 2
description: Get ready for some high-speed retro action! Only the best can escape the Neon Nightmare...

name: I Love Finding Critters
description: I Love Finding Critters is a classic hidden object game where you can search for a huge assortment of animals! Squirrels, hamsters, chicks, ducks, and so many more! Find them all in beautiful scenic locations and solve puzzles and play mini games as you go along.

name: Touch Some Grass
description: Someone told me to go touch some grass. I'm pretty sure this is what they meant.

name: The Smash Cars Tournament
description: Your goal is to pass every mission without being crushed. It probably seems pretty hard at first glance, but once you get it, you will become a true master.

name: Solitaire Jack Frost: Winter Adventures 3
description: Believe in the power of frosty layouts in Solitaire Jack Frost Winter Adventures 3

name: Flappy Bird
description: An unofficial remake of Flappy Bird for the 3DS.

name: HAL_Ver99
description:
"...ru."
"...Haru."
"Haru."
"Wake up soon."
"I want to see you soon."
"...Good morning, Haru"

A psychedelic yandere BL game about talking to an AI.

name: Blood Flows Where My Shotgun Blows
description: 6 relatively short maps for Final Doom: The Plutonia Experiment

name: Bride of the Full Moon
description: The fantasy that begins when the full moon RISES.

name: Bucket Crusher
description:
Power up your machine and get caught up in the craze of destruction! Will you manage to completely destroy the wall until not a single brick is left standing?

Immerse yourself in the most satisfying casual game where you tear down walls brick by brick using a circular saw! Push the bricks into your Bucket Crusher to convert them into cash, but watch out because you can run out of fuel!

name: Akindo
description: This is a real-time battle RPG focused around themes of "reconstruction and development" in a comical and fun pixel-art world. Explore a deteriorating island, gather materials, invest in industrial facilities, and build roads to revitalize the economy.

name: Ice Hockey: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
description: Sin descripción

name: Hot Lap League
description:
Take complete control of your vehicle, perfect your driving, and prove your place in the Hot Lap League. Drift and race your car around 150+ mind blowing tracks, each requiring unique techniques and strategies. Improving your time by racing your best is the only way to the top.
It’s you, the track and the clock - no driving assist, no nonsense.

name: Redactle
description: Redactle is a daily browser-based puzzle game where the user tries to determine the subject of a random obfuscated Wikipedia article, chosen from Wikipedia's 10,000 Vital Articles. Type in words to reveal them on the page. Figure out the article title to win. New puzzle daily at 11:00 am CDT (16:00 UTC).

name: Brasfoot 2022
description:
Soccer manager and coach game.

Become a manager and command a soccer team, buy and sell players, choose the tactics and participate in the championships that simulate reality.

The game is super light, and several seasons can be played quickly and fun.

name: Rainbow
description:
Rainbow is a colorful game for children which helps them learn the names of colors.
There are two game modes: Kids mode and Normal mode. In Kids mode, the name of the color is shown in the color which the players need to guess, so the kids can learn it easily and fast. Normal mode, however, has the names colored in black, so it is harder for players to guess.

name: Gemlands
description: A short 1st person, Playstation 1'esque 3D platformer for lovers of collectathons

name: Ketchup and Mayonnaise
description: Frenetic, chaotic battles! A dynamic duo, who are the best of friends, come out swinging in this pretty absurd RPG!

name: GenEi AP: Empty Heart
description:
Travel through the world of Harumakigohan in a quest for music.

”What are you listening to, Mikage?”
Spica is looking for something to listen to, and Mikage, the protagonist, goes on a journey in a mysterious world to search for songs that will please her friend.

What’s behind that last door? What is that heartbeat you can hear?

name: Nemo: Puzzle Pack II
description: More picross puzzles for PICO-8.

name: Retrobloc CPC
description: Retrobloc CPC is a 3d puzzle game, similar to the late 80's Block Out, for the Amstrad CPC 464 / 664 / 6182. The game is simple to play but hard to master!

name: Undertoad: Mission Luigi
description: Explore the town of Sherborough and chat with the townsfolks. To leave town, you must conquer Luigi's gauntlet, a set of trials that will push even the most prestigious jumpers to their limit. Make sure to prepare yourself because there is no going back. Now get Movin', Butterball!

name: 3-in-1 fun bundle
description:
1. Toroom
There are more than 70 different regular, cursed, and ultra-rare items as well as more than 35 weapons uniquely made for every biome.
Get loot, loot, and MORE LOOT! Find rewards, coins, and items that will improve your character for you to get ready for the challenges ahead.
Have awesome and challenging fights against hard bosses to defeat them and get to the next biome.

2. Him & Her 3
Help the cutest video game couple to meet once again. A puzzle platformer with an unique gameplay mechanic. Only love can win in the end.

3. Scribbled
A 100% handmade art, It was created with pencil and paper.
Join this wonderful adventure in a world full of challenges and creatures.
This game is made for all ages

name: Clotilde Soffritti in Never Double Park your Spaceship
description:
After being stuck on an asteroid with a decrepit, gabby hermit for a week, Clotilde has had enough!

She must find a way to call for help and hitch-hike a ride out of there!

Will she manage to escape the asteroid?! Only one way to find out! Or maybe two.

name: Osu! Octave
description: Osu! Octave is a free and open source rhythm game designed to play Osu! Standard beatmaps, optimized for best performance and playability on PlayStation Vita.

name: Axolotl is Dry
description: Axolotl is Dry is a precision platforming game where you play as a little axolotl taken from his home. You'll need to jump, dash and slide your way through the harsh desert before you sweat yourself dry. Help the axolotl get to his home!

name: Memory Puzzle: Bad Girl
description: Train your brain with this memory game, revealing the naughty sexual adventures of a young bad girl, in images hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match.

name: Oil Invasion
description: You are super soldier whose mission is to find captured oil which is captured from evil army from East

name: Furry Cyberfucker
description: Furry Cyberfucker is a cyberpunk-themed CCD game with some hot animated sex scenes.

name: Axolotl
description: Become a magnificent elephant who climbs things in the mid of a desert.

name: Micro Stunt Machina
description: Micro Stunt Machina is a casual game perfect mix of puzzle and arcade. On 80 Levels, get your micro-cars to the finish line going through obstacles over micro-tracks.

name: Monster Girls and the Mysterious Adventure 2
description: This is a "Mysterious Dungeon" style roguelike game where the terrain changes with each challenge. Make the monsters your "Friends" and go on a new adventure!

name: Kung Fu Grand King
description: Once a great hero and a servant of the Emperor, Lan Mei now enjoys a quiet life running a dojo. However, when a new evil appears, she is called back into the world of martial arts to take part in a tournament that will determine the true Kung Fu Grand King!

name: Obsessive Revenge
description: After Mike's brother is arrested, victim of false accusations, Mike discovers that Jonathan was responsible for his brother's arrest, and so decides to kill him on a government ranch, where several government agents belonging to the witness protection service are.

name: The Ducksuckers
description: The Ducksuckers is a Kinetic Comedy Visual Novel about music, battling inner demons and the inability to let go. Taking about 40-60 minutes to read it's a short and sweet read, with some dramatic elements.

name: Perceptio
description: Perceptio is a VR puzzle game set on a small floating Japanese aesthetic island, solve 10 small puzzles and fix the worlds time to complete the game.

name: SuperTux Advance
description: SuperTux Advance is a fan game of SuperTux written in Squirrel using Brux GDK. The name comes from the graphical style, which uses a lower resolution display and a sprite style similar to Sonic Advance.

name: The Royal Game of Ur 3D
description: The oldest board game known to mankind!

name: Hot Spring Hero
description: A hot spring hotel deep in the forest. There are natural silly hostesses, gluttonous dog-eared female chefs, cat-eared female fishermen, and even the hot spring goddess, all for the revival of this hot spring hotel! The adventurous life with the lovely heroines day and night, look forward to your arrival!

name: Contract Marriage
description:
In this interactive story choice game, you are the one in control of the romantic story!
You have multiple options on how the story will unfold.
Immerse yourself in an enchanted game of your choice.

name: Bankruptcy
description: This game was made for Ludum Dare 50. It's pretty tight.​Buy and sell properties for your inherited failing real estate business. You can’t stop it from going under, but perhaps you can delay the inevitable long enough to make yourself some real money! TIPS AND TRICKS: -Listing prices will fluctuate depending on Trends. Buy uptrending properties early to maximize profit, and avoid buying downtrending properties unless you can immediately sell them. -Properties in your inventory when the markets close will be sold for 80 percent of their Value automatically.

name: Living Island Project
description: Sin descripción

name: The A500 Mini
description:
Now other classic consoles are just toys!

Introducing THEA500 Mini, a compact reimagining of this classic home computer. Featuring perfect emulation of not only the original A500 (OCS) and Enhanced Chip Set (ECS) of future revisions, but also the Advanced Graphics Architecture (AGA) of the A1200. Play one of the included 25 classic Amiga games, selected from a simple to use carousel, including all-time greats like Alien Breed 3D, Another World, Simon the Sorcerer and Worms. Or side-load your own games via USB stick with full WHDLoad support and an array of options to choose from. Plus save and resume your game at any time to help you finish those punishingly difficult classics.

The THEA500 Mini comes with the original style 2-button mouse and newly engineered 8-button precision gamepad, allowing you to choose your control method. To compliment the on-screen keyboard, you can plug in an external standard USB PC keyboard for additional functionality.

name: Amanda the Adventurer: Pilot Episode
description: Digging through your attic you found a box set of an old children's TV show, Amanda the Adventurer, starring a brave girl named Amanda and a cowardly sheep named Wooly. You don't recall any specific episodes or characters in the show. Or what happens in the show exactly. Or much about it at all come to think about it, but it still feels strangely familiar. Curiosity takes hold and you decide to watch the tapes and let HORROR nostalgia take you back to a simpler age.

name: Sonic Dash+
description:
Sonic Dash+ is the advanced edition of Sonic the Hedgehog’s first endless runner, Sonic Dash, that was originally released in 2013.

Sonic Dash+ released for Apple Arcade in 2022 . This updated version do not have microtransactions or ads present in the original game.

name: The Wand of Gamelon Remastered Randomizer
description: A randomizer mod for The Wand of Gamelon Remastered.

name: The Faces of Evil Remastered Randomizer
description: A randomizer mod for The Faces of Evil Remastered.

name: Blut Club
description: On that cold and early morning of 2003, you stumble upon a lost mobile phone... Piece together elements of that tragic night in this short horror experience.

name: Friday Night Funkin' Indie Cross
description:
You shall cross through indie worlds

Think you have the balls to survive?

Indie Cross is a mod for Friday Night Funkin that features three weeks against popular indie characters, Cuphead, Sans from Undertale, and Bendy. It also contains multiple bonus songs, a custom achievements system, Game Jolt integration, and fully animated cutscenes for each individual song in the mod.

name: Coloring Pixels: Tarot Pack
description: Tarot BookThis Tarot themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Unlock the secrets to your future with this book, each image is a stylised Tarot card!

name: Maze
description:
Can you find your way out of over 200 mazes? Play through three different modes to beat the clock and escape as fast as you can in Maze.

Use the Arrow Keys to move around the map. Your goal is to get to the large green circle as fast as you can!

name: D*sco Ep
description: A space-themed video game concept album that will take you through a series of wildly different gameplay concepts, art styles and soundscapes. There may also be dogs.

name: Touhou Heardle
description: A clone of Heardle, but for Touhou Music.

name: Tales of Grumville: A Legendary Pie and A Nameless Statue
description:
The small town of Grumville is many things to many people. To some, it is the heart of all of things wonderful and mysterious. To others, it is the land of dreams no longer dreamed about. To little Audrey, it is her new home and "the ugliest, most boring town in the whole freaking world".

Follow her journey as she tries to fight boredom in her small new town, comes across a mysterious statue whose name has been lost in time and stumbles upon perhaps the greatest adventure of her life (so far).

name: Red Wings: Coloring Planes Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Bunnies vs. Bunnies: Ukraine Edition
description:
A short but challenging realtime strategy game which is primarily a heavy-handed fable.

This is a newly updated and enhanced edition dedicated to the people of Ukraine.

name: Ukrainian Farmy
description:
In Ukrainian Farmy you become one of the scariest combatants on the Ukrainian battlefield - the Ukrainian tractor driver.

It is an arcade game where you challenge yourself against time and "high-precision" artillery bombardments, and capture as many Russian tanks, trucks, and APCs as you can.

name: Calm Colors
description:
In the game you will find 200 low poly illustrations to fill (animals, nature, origami and more), solo mode with hours of soothing gameplay, up to 4 players local co-op mode, a simple and enjoyable way to reduce anxiety and train mindfulness

Discover your inner artist by playing Calm Colors.

name: Sex Adventures: Futanari BDSM
description: A click-through visual novel about a lesbian couple who goes to a secret BDSM club. They must be prepared for whatever the dominatrix tells them to do.

name: Cotton Games' New Game Bundle
description: This bundle includes Cotton Games' latest Xbox game: Mr. Pumpkin 2 and Rain City.

name: Land of Warfare: Battle Maps
description: Land of Warfare is a skirmish map war strategy game. You will need to plan a strategy to build and defend your base from enemy attacks, collect resources to booster your regiment and then defeat your enemies by infiltrating their base. No missions, no unlocks, just load and play.

name: Revenant Saga & Revenant Dogma
description: Experience epic RPG adventures at once! This bundle includes Revenant Saga and Revenant Dogma.

name: Shootball Arena
description: Shootball Arena is a fast paced online multiplayer game in which football and third person shooter merge together. Choose your avatar, hold your favorite gun and challenge your friends in exciting matches up to ten players. You need speed, agility and a perfect shot… do you have what it takes?

name: Horror Bundle: Paratopic + Fatum Betula
description: Looking for a thrilling experience? This bundle is perfect for you!

name: 3D Box Sokoban
description: 3D Box Sokoban is a logic game that will exercise your brain, helping developing its capabilities. - The goal of the puzzle is to push all of the boxes onto the goals. - Only one box can be pushed at a time.

name: Stacklands
description: Stacklands is a village builder where you stack cards to collect food, build structures, and fight creatures.

name: Monster Master
description: Monster Master makes RTS fight versus FPS. Be the horde or survive together in this asymmetric reverse horror multiplayer

name: Rocket Cows
description: The cows are 'udderly' fed up being abducted!

name: Boreal Tenebrae
description: Boreal Tenebrae will take you on a retro-style adventure, with a mysterious atmosphere and horror elements. The game is inspired by 90s classics and the best TV series.

name: Cyberstellar
description: Cyberstellar - Shoot'em Up. First game rendered in 3D Pixel (2D Rendered Voxel). Animations following the example of some animations of some "3D pixel movie". Protect Earth and Mars from alien attacks, but be careful not to lose control of the ship in the midst of storms.

name: Nightfall
description: Nightfall is a top down sci-fi game with turn based combat. After waking up on a strange world without any recollection of your past, you must explore, fight, and survive in order to rediscover your memories and find out why, and by whom they were taken away.

name: Milf Toys 2
description: Hentai is not just 2D girls, this is a whole art. And in this art units understand.

name: Yummy Girl 2
description: Sweet buns, ruddy cupcakes, juicy burgers - all these yummy girls love to eat. They are just waiting for you to feed them! ( ˘▽˘)っ♨

name: Deliverance
description: Deliverance is a story of mystery, thrill and discovery. A choice-based adult visual novel allows you to explore the detective’s both sides. The hero, fighting to save his loved ones, or the villain willing to abandon all morality for power.

name: Retrieving the Past: Steam Edition
description: Action, Adventure & Romance. Lots of beautiful women for you as Jensen Wenchester to meet and have fun times with. Beware there are sinister forces trying to stop you.

name: Chest Mate
description: A precision based tower defense/puzzle game that focuses on optimization! Control your cannon, optimize your defenses and defend your mate! Chest Mate is a challenging aim-based strategy game.

name: 79 Pompeii
description: 79 Pompeii is an adventure style game set in the ancient city of Pompeii, during the volcanic eruption that destroyed it in year 79.

name: Cool Kid Cody
description: In a world of Losers, Cool Kids and Gods, where Losers wish they were Cool Kids, Cool Kids wish they were Gods and Gods rule over all, Cool Kid Cody embarks on his quest for Godhood! All he's gotta do is achieve the impossible: transform the biggest Loser in school into a Cool Kid.

name: Hidden Farm Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Tower Words
description: Word game that mixes tetris, categories game and word search.

name: Where are My Mittens
description: A lost kitty. A dangerous environment. It's snowing. A cute indie platformer about a boy named Jason looking for a kitty named Mittens. Requires a standard qwerty keyboard and mouse.

name: Keep it Live
description: Keep-it-Live is a small, singleplayer high-score game in which you assume the role of a live stream chat moderator.

name: The Ancestral Legacy!
description: 'The Ancestral Legacy' is a visual horror novel game that lets you step into the shoes of the main character and experience mystery, horror, and thrills as you choose your own story. Experience a wide range of episodes and discover tons of thrilling stories in all the chapters.

name: Dreamvibe
description: Dreamvibe is an interactive audiovisual experience where you use your blade to blow the fluids of music vibes as they come flying at you. Every beat has its direction you need to match.

name: Metal Dogs: Bow Wow Wonderful Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:

- Metal Dogs
- Tote Bag
- Wonderful Doghouse Limited Edition Box
- Wonderful CD Can Case (Frisbee Style)
- Special Soundtrack
- Special Coasters

name: Get Tanked!
description: Why settle for regular tanks when you can drive a super tank? Forget about physics laws and challenge your friends in dynamic and rule-free clashes on one of many exciting arenas. Wishlist now and Get Tanked! in multiplayer combat arena.

name: Doki Doki Literature Club Plus!: Premium Edition
description: Enter the #1 Psychological Horror Experience!

name: Dear Althea
