description: Decide Althea's fate in dark Victorian London. Experience the story of an upper-class young woman whose family is falling apart along with her future and who is filled with diverse and interesting characters among whom she may find love.

name: Metal Dogs
description: Pochi, a battle dog in the apocalypse, meets a Mysterious old scientist in a village at the foot of Mt.Fuji. A spin-off of the heretical JRPG "Metal Max" and its latest work "Metal Max Xeno Reborn", which celebrates its 30th anniversary this year, is now available as a roguelike action game!

name: Serious Sam: Tormental
description: Serious Sam: Tormental is a 3D rogue-lite top-down shooter where you blast your way through the tormented mind of demigod of destruction Mental, as he imagines worlds and monsters that stand on your path towards his inner ego. Let the showdown begin!

name: Die drei???: Plan der Chamäleonbande
description: A wave of sophisticated robberies is keeping the whole country on tenterhooks. The well-camouflaged "Chameleon Gang" is said to be behind it. Strangely enough, the places and times of the burglaries coincide with the tour schedule of a popular singing duo. Are the musicians behind the crimes? Bob goes along on tour and investigates undercover. But where are Justus and Peter?

name: SuKuBus-Mission
description: SuKuBus-Mission is an erotic role-playing game about a group of perverts trying to avoid the extermination of all lust.

name: Monuments of Mars 2
description: Monuments of Mars 2 is an eleven-level episode WAD for Doom II designed for limit removing source ports created by various members of the Doomer Boards community, led by Jon Vail (40oz). It is the forty-sixth entry in the ongoing Doomer Boards Projects. The project is an add-on sequel to the first DBP in celebration of the series' fourth anniversary. It is intended to be loaded with and continue from its predecessor and starts at MAP08.

name: DK: King of Swing Remix
description:
This hack replaces the game’s levels with new custom designed levels built using the game’s existing assets. The tutorial, Jungle Jam and boss levels have not been edited.

In addition to the custom levels, this hack also includes:

- Character selection screen in adventure mode: unlocked after completing adventure mode (or by using the password 00011000).
- The tutorial and intro can now be skipped by holding select when starting adventure mode.

name: Buddies
description: Buddies is a party game where you and your friends are forced to reveal secrets that you have kept hidden for years. Which of you is the best cook? Which of you will start tearing up first while watching a moving film? All secrets will come to light, and you will surely learn something new about yourself.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Elysian Reverie
description:
Version 5.6 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Reverist Calico
• New Featured Event: Starless Nights
• New Elysian Realm Chapter: Flame-Chasers' Trials Chapter 3
• Elysian Realm Rework
• ...and more!

name: Mokoko X Deluxe
description: Mokoko X was inspired from the arcade games like Volfied, Qix and Gals Panic. A popular gaming style in the late 1980’s, Mokoko X looks to resurrect the soul of the arcade genre while adding a modern touch. There are 32 levels in Mokoko X; each level has its own unique boss and minions. The main goal is assisting the girls that need help from the weird bosses. This is sometimes passing a mobile game level, sometimes helping out with the insects in the kitchen.

name: NekoBop
description: Sin descripción

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Dark Goliath Pack
description:
Elevate yourself to the ranks of a warlord and ride into battle with a full-blown beast-of-a-bundle!

This pack includes all the content of the Mighty Beast Pack with extra rewards.

Full content:
1 Dragon Windguard Epic
1 Dragon Marauder Epic
3 Legendary Helmets
2 Epic Shields
1 Rare Shield
2,200 Gems
A 14-day XP Booster
2 Legendary Banners
2 Legendary Titles
2 Legendary Player Icons
2 Legendary Backgrounds

name: Friday Night Funkin' Battle Waifu
description: A gunshot music game with a whole of brand new gameplays and variety of interesting modes to experience. FNF Music Shoot: Waifu Battle won't let you down. It'll get you at the first moment you try it out!!!

name: Yume Nikki Ver. 1.00
description:
Yume Nikki ver. 1.00 is an English Yume Nikki mod developed by 369071 2458. This is an expansion mod that adds a number of new areas and events to the game, along with an alternate ending.

The gameplay remains the same as the original. The player enters the dream world by sleeping in the bed. The main objective of the game also remains the same; the player must obtain all of the effects by exploring the dream world to unlock one of two endings.

name: Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX2 - Special DLC Boss: Kirin
description: Adds the "VS Kirin" mission to the base mission select menu. Select this mission to go into battle against Kirin from Azure Striker Gunvolt 3.

name: Total War: Medieval II
description: Medieval II brings Total War's compelling mix of massive real-time battles and intricate turn-based strategy to iPhone and iPad. Set across three continents during the turbulent Middle Ages, spectacular conflicts and scheming rivals line the path to power as the great kingdoms of the medieval world vie for supremacy. Be it through diplomacy or conquest, trade or subterfuge, you must secure the resources and loyalty required to rule an empire from the shores of Western Europe to the sands of Arabia.

name: Orcs Must Die! 3 Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Uno: Assassin's Creed Valhalla Theme Cards
description: Play your favorite card game like a Viking in UNO Valhalla DLC, inspired by the world of Assassin’s Creed Valhalla.

name: Orcs Must Die! 3: Tipping the Scales
description: In Tipping the Scales, the new Tuatara enemy race invades across five new maps including a new War Scenario! Bring your new gear to the fight to overcome the Tuatara’s special ability that limits the damage they can take.

name: Furry Shakespeare: Two Incredibly Ripped, Absolutely Shredded Noble Kinsmen
description: Will you help the Emperor get re-elected, or will you just straight-up start a rebellion? It's up to you to decide in this political ballgame.

name: Arcade Archives: Pac-Land
description: Pac-Land is a side-scrolling action game released by Namco in 1984. The title follows Pac-Man on a quest to bring lost fairies home to Fairyland. What strange events will Pac-Man encounter as he leaves town, then passes through the mountains and forests? Pac-Man's charming adventures begin here!

name: Red White Yellow Zinger
description: - A puzzle game in which blocks are erased in the order of red, white, and yellow! - Collaboration with popular music creator Room97! This is a falling puzzle in which six blocks of three different colors are lined up and erased. The blocks can only be erased in order. Blocks of indelible colors can be aligned first to form a chain. BGM is played while the block disappears and until the next block disappears. In the meantime, you can keep the BGM playing by aligning the next block and continuing to erase it. Advanced users can even play a full song. All songs are in collaboration with popular music creator Room97! The wide range of sounds, from K-POP to nostalgic melodies, employing a variety of singers, enhances the pleasantness of the combo.

name: Catharsis
description: Descend deep in the dungeons of Catharsis to reclaim what you've lost. Dive into this First Person Dungeon Crawler featuring a grim aesthetic with a heavy focus on character growth, exploration and customization!

name: Godfall: Ultimate Edition
description: Aperion is on the precipice of ruin. You are the last of the Valorian knights, god-like warriors able to equip Valorplates, legendary armor sets that transform wielders into unstoppable masters of melee combat. Ascend in Godfall, the first-of-its-kind, looter-slasher, melee action-RPG.

name: Relics 2: The Crusader's Tomb
description: Four thousand miles. Twenty thousand pounds. Four murderous rivals. One unforgettable adventure.

name: Thunder League Online
description: A strategic MOBA-styled game where you play as a team to complete objectives against the opposing team. Play as unique adorable agents and use their abilities to change the outcomes of the chaotic battle arena! Defend the base, eliminate the enemies or just do both! The strategies are all yours!

name: Waves Running Simulator
description: Have you seen the enormous waves destroying the planet? If not, you are in the right place! In Waves Running Simulator you have to escape from the tsunami as fast as possible.

name: Space Beastz
description: Space Beastz is a cooperative multiplayer music and rhythm game. On a music-playing spaceship, players must time their actions just right to keep multiple instruments running and make the most amazing music the galaxy has ever heard!

name: Spingram
description: Spingram is an exciting puzzle game that will blow your brain, with hundreds of levels and an extraordinary design. Our minds love challenges, and Spingram goes the extra mile to challenge players' gray matter. The goal of the game is to reconstruct the pattern presented in the preview by rotating the blocks in any direction. To align the trace perfectly you will need to examine the position and orientation of the original. If you are in trouble, you can always start over or undo the last move.

name: Radon Break
description: Radon Blast is a classic Brick Breaker / Arkanoid style game. Break bricks by using the ball. Get items like speed, ball splitter and paddle resize to make the game more challenging. Some specials like gun, power ball or block wall helps you while playing your game.

name: Terry Poorflyer
description: Help Terry Poorflyer escape an island ruled by evil crabs! Inspired by retro side-scrolling platformers, Terry Poorflyer adds own "stomp" flair to it, handled by physics engine more advanced than in HL3!

name: Bibi & Tina: New Adventures with Horses
description: A violent storm has hit the area near Martinshof. Mount up and see what damage the storm has done. Ride across the fields, jump over numerous obstacles and have Bibi the witch magic away the mess. But most of all, you can have lots of fun in fast-paced horse races, show off your jumping and slalom riding skills, take loving care of the horses and send photos to your worried friend Naomi in Australia.

name: Behind the Screen & Defoliation
description: Behind the Screen & Defoliation is a suspense puzzle set of games.

name: Demeo: PC Edition
description: It’s dangerous to go alone! Grab your friends and assemble a party, because plumbing the depths of Demeo requires strategy, cunning, and teamwork. An award-winning cooperative tabletop adventure for up to four players.

name: Chronicle of Infinity
description: Chronicle of Infinity is an MMORPG that plunges you in the middle of a battles between the Astral Alliance and the Obsidian Alliance.

name: Road Maintenance Simulator
description: Experience the everyday life in a German street maintenance service and complete a variety of realistic tasks in the area of road construction and maintenance! For your work you will have unique vehicles and various usable tools at your disposal.

name: Chrono Cross: The Radical Dreamers Edition
description: Chrono Cross: The Radical Dreamers Edition is a remaster of Chrono Cross bundled with Radical Dreamers, which was previously only released for the Satellaview in Japan.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Moveit
description: A touching story and a unique narrative with puzzles.

name: How to Fool a Liar King: Remastered
description: The cute fantasy visual novel, "How to Fool a Liar King" returns as a remastered version. Regina, a girl who loves cats, a bit forgetful but confident in her strength, suddenly appears inside a forest in Eroolia. Juli immediately finds her, but how did she get here?

name: Nora's AdventurEscape
description: After a life-changing accident ends your career as an Olympic ice skating champion, it's time for you, Nora Crawford, to find your new life's purpose! And where better to start looking than your childhood hero's hometown? But a quick visit brings new challenges when you find the town's residents preparing for an annual county competition and well on their way to another loss. Can you help the town win the grand prize, discover more about your hero and yourself, and even find true love? Find out in this Hidden-Object Puzzle game!

name: Child of Lothian
description: In Child of Lothian, you play as an orphan robbed of her childhood as her family is put on trial by malicious witch hunters. You are left on the streets to escape their persecution inside the bustling 18th century Edinburgh.

name: Green Hell VR
description: Green Hell VR is the most complex and authentic survival game for VR. The game faithfully recreates the dangerous conditions of the Amazon jungle. Alone and stranded, you will never feel safe. To survive, you have to face your weaknesses. Maintaining hunger, thirst, fatigue and mental health is going to be an integral part of your journey. Wild animal attacks and tropical diseases could strike you down at any time and out of nowhere if you are not prepared. Since you won’t get any help from the outside world, you need to craft your tools and weapons, learn how to build shelters, and heal nasty wounds.

name: The House of the Dead: Remake
description: The House of the Dead: Remake is a remade version of the game introduced in 1997 in arcade platform. A classic arcade rail-shooter receives a whole new entourage and gameplay changes to suit modern gaming standards.

name: Circle Empires Tactics
description: Get ready for a new spin on Circle Empires. Predict, plan and attack! Circle Empires Tactics is a simultaneous turn-based strategy game that you can play solo and in multiplayer. Build up your army, use spells and give orders to your troops in the hope that you've outsmarted your rivals.

name: Janitor Bleeds
description: Janitor Bleeds is a retro-inspired horror game set in an old arcade, appearing out of nowhere.

name: Chinatown Detective Agency
description: Chinatown Detective Agency is a cyber-noir point and click adventure blending stunning retro design with innovative mechanics. Manage your detective agency and use real world research to solve cases as you unravel a global conspiracy.

name: Screeps: Arena
description: Screeps Arena is a multiplayer strategy game for programming enthusiasts, wherein the core mechanic is programming your units AI. You write JavaScript that fights 24/7 against other players in a match-based arena environment.

name: Pet Vet 3D: Animal Hospital
description: Have tons of fun running your very own pet vet clinic. As doctor, you’ll get to take care of fuzzy bunnies, adorable cats, dogs, horses, ponies, and even piglets. Enjoy awesome activities from check-ups to dog training and horseback riding.

name: OpenViva
description: OpenViva is an free and open source continuation of Project Viva. Viva is a VR and non-VR compatible game where you can interact with your very own AI anime character!

name: Epic Vampire
description: You must Bite ALL of the people to make them into Vampires. Collect ALL Bitecoins. Use Speed Boost, Transform, and Powerball. Drive a Hearse and Fly as a Bat. * This game has Permadeath, so, If You Die or Quit, You have to start over from the beginning. *

name: Corrupted Cistern
description: Clear the ancient water caverns of the evil Hellspawn

name: The Healing
description:
Out of the blue, you’re added to a group chat by Dr. Crow, an ominous person in the guise of a plague doctor. For some inexplicable reason, it's impossible for you to leave this chat.
You’re added to a mysterious group chat with 7 others you don't know. While you're figuring out what the group is all about, Dr. Crow – an ominous stranger with a plague doctor mask – suddenly appears!
Initially you take the situation casually, but suddenly a real psycho terror begins! Creepy dolls and symbols randomly appear at your house. You receive shocking video calls and mysterious clues.

name: WonderWorld
description: WONDERWORLD is an adventure-RPG game inspired by UNDERTALE

name: Win the Diamond
description: Win The Diamond is a 3d side scroller action adventure sci-fi shooter game where there is a Diamond hidden somewhere in the level. The player needs to find the diamond and collect it, in order to win the diamond. But collecting it will not be an easy task.

name: Chrono Trigger+
description:
This hack adds a ton of cut content back into the game, allows access to previously unexplorable areas, fixes some bugs and offers some options to remove the linearity from the game. Full list of changes in the readme.

In addition 1999 is fully explorable and offers tons of stuff to do. As well as more Easter eggs and quality of life improvements.

More stuff carries over like names money, fair prizes and cats.

name: Milk Bottle and Monster Girl 2
description: "Moke Bottle and Monster Girl 2" is a shooting game that avoids monsters and breaks the target point. There will be 5 monsters in each level. Players can control the Moke bottle to avoid monsters and break the target point to clear the level.

name: Shuv-It
description: A minimalist puzzle game for the Playdate.

name: Ravensburger Labyrinth
description: In search of mysterious objects and creatures, players roam the labyrinth as a magician, witch, fortune teller and sorcerer's apprentice. Whoever finds the way first wins. Luckily, they can use magic to move the walls of the maze. On the way through constantly changing paths, however, each player must first reach secret locations. The mystery cards reveal whether the next target is a ghost, a bunch of keys, an owl or something else. The first to discover all the secrets and return to their starting point is the winner. The random arrangement of the maze cards makes each game different.

name: Ceramic Soul
description: Within a Victorian manor, wake up as Yu, a porcelain doll, modeled to look like The Mother’s perfect daughter. Solve puzzles with the help of a detachable hand, hide from grievous threats, explore the manor, and search for your past to reclaim pieces of your soul and claim your freedom.

name: Catchee
description:
The simple, happy musical catch em up!
Catch as many Catchables as you can in this happy little musical Catch-Em-Up! Multiply your points with spin flips and go for perfects to max out your score! Play offline too!
Free, addictive, fast gameplay with challenging perfects, loads of songs and Catchee themes to unlock!

name: Traditional Braves
description: Traditional Simulation RPG with Great Thinking Program "SESS-AI"!

name: Outbreak: Gold Collection
description: Experience Lydia's undead journey in the Outbreak Gold Collection.

name: Outbreak: Palladium Collection
description: Experience seven retro survival horror nightmares in the Outbreak Palladium Collection.

name: Worm Run
description: Worm Run is an exciting endless arcade game in which you move the worm right or left, trying to avoid obstacles standing in your way, break the blocks to achieve the goal, collects the worm body items to increase its length, collect coins to unlocks new worms and complete the levels. 20 different characters to unlock and infinite levels guarantees you long hours of fun!

name: Strangest.io's My Megamix '21
description: Seven awesome games made in seven adrenaline laced, drug-fueled days. One free price. Enter the mix. Sponsored by Parsec & Strangest.io!

name: Scary Wife HD
description: You wake up in your house but there is a girl here. She said she is your new wife and you are the husband. But you don't have a memories about your marriage with her. Is it some kind of prank? Something is very creepy about her, say hello to your new scary wife!

name: Darold the Doomer: Psychedelic Lucid Dreams
description: 3D Psychedelic Story Based RPG

name: The Sinking Structure, Clione, and Lost Child: Log5
description: Two silent wanderers,6 full chapters,A game of exploration and adventure

name: VR AirHockey
description: Giant air field hockey played on a fantastic field.

name: Lonely Knight
description: Lonely Knight is a story that immerses you in an epic adventure in the medieval era. Avenge your wife as you battle invading forces, go on game-changing quests, and make influential choices. Fight in brutal battles where you will experience fast-paced combat, castle sieges, and more.

name: Heroes of the Dark
description: Battle Vampires, Werewolves and Humans in a dark Imperial Age strategy game! Collect and upgrade Heroes for 5v5 action, forge alliances, and restore world order.

name: Outbreak: Contagious Memories
description: Outbreak: Contagious Memories is a send-up to classic 90’s horror series like Resident Evil and Silent Hill where your survival will be determined by moment-to-moment decisions, what you decide to carry, and how good you are at spotting conveniently written notes.

name: Kombinera
description: Formidable puzzles. Precise navigation. Balls. Simultaneous control. A fallen king…

name: Z-Warp
description: Z-Warp is an intense vertical shoot'em up presented in retro pixel art style, featuring frenetic arcade-inspired action where blasters, bombs and killer specials are your only allies. Shoot down demonic enemies as they try to overwhelm your ship with bullet hell salvos and turn the tide of battle by charging your killer weapon capable of instantly wiping out anything in a tight radius around your ship! Face massive boss abominations and aim for high scores in Story or Endless modes.

name: Mokoko X
description: Nostalgic arcade gameplay remastered! Capture areas and save the girls from various troublemakers.

name: Magnet Crusher
description:
Use your magnets to control your puck and send it onto your enemies to blast them.
You can either master the magnetic forces, keep your momentum and destroy any incoming threat, or fail to keep up the pace and perish. Good luck!

Remember, brute strength won't help you here. Use the pulling force of the magnets to dodge, weave and gain distance until you can project yourself into the enemies and destroy them. Thankfully, you have some other tools at your disposal: special abilities that you can unlock and use regularly to help you against the waves of foes.

name: Jumphobia: Homeward Bound
description: Jump, skip, hop and leap in Jumphobia: Homeward Bound, an indie sci-fi adventure game! Go as far as your little wheel can take you! Play as a little delivery bot from a far-flung future controlled by the monolithic "MARE" corporation, and find your way back home through the perilous deserts, dead forests, and untold wildlands that lie ahead.

name: Cygnus Racing League
description: On your marks! Get Set! SURVIVE! The Cygnus Galaxy invites you to join one of the greatest sporting spectacles in the known universe, The Cygnus Racing League!

name: Beasts of Burden
description: A psychological horror game and ARG inspired by the late 90s era of handheld gaming

name: The Drained Goddess
description: The Drained Goddess is a first-person 3D action horror game. You will have to investigate what happened long ago. But those evil entities have been watching you and waiting for your return for decades. Will you try to defeat and expel them? Or just get what you need and sneak away?

name: Tamaghost Jump!
description:
Snooze your alarm to delay waking up from your nice dream...But the more you snooze, the more you risk your dream turning into a nightmare...

Entry for Ludum Dare 50 Game Jam. The theme was "Delay the Inevitable".

name: Blockage
description: Find the source of your strange symptoms.

name: The Secret Turnabout
description: There is no such thing as a flawless system. No matter how we delude ourselves, the cracks will always appear. When that time comes for it to crumble under the weight of failed expectations, will you salvage the remains? Or, will you pretend that it was all just a bad dream?

name: The Bones of Rosalinda
description:
”Hey, you! Skeleton lady! Can you hear me? You’ve got to pull yourself together and run before the Necromancer turns you into one of his minions!”

Rosalinda realised she wasn’t dreaming. She was in a dark cave, most of her body was missing and there was an agitated brown mouse yelling at her.

”O-okay,” she said. “How do I get out of this place? And... where are my legs?”

Her first day of un-life wasn’t going to be easy.

name: Fairest
description:
“Mirror, mirror, on the wall,” you say dreamily, gazing into its sparkling surface…

“You know,” replies the mirror, “I can do a lot more than just reflect fair faces. O, how I long to leap off this wall! I want to meet princesses, witches, and wolves … to win a throne and become a hero! What say you?”

Well, what say you, adventurer?

name: Rude Chess
description:
Use arrow keys to walk, R to restart and Z to undo

Push blocks & chess pieces onto the grey Xs

Chess pieces will try to make your life harder, this'll be explained better in-game

Wow

name: Indecent Details: Find the Difference
description: Indecent Details is a barebones free adult “find the differences” game.

name: Goodnight Tea
description: Goodnight Tea is a small game about a small fairy wanting to go to bed, but needing her girlfriends to snuggle!

name: Lose95
description: Lose95 yourself to the depths of your folders and try to make space for the downloads!

name: Crow Quest
description: Eat, swear & try to take over the neighbourhood.

name: Transaction Failed
description:
A story about being queer in a capitalistic world.
A story about escaping a convenience store. (where you can only trust the employees.)
A story about yellow. about its past, present and future.
Try to find an exit or the store will close down and you will be forever alone!

name: Computerfriend
description:
The year is 1999. The place is Godfield, Louisiana: the tech capital of the world, where the sky bleeds acid and the mud boils in the bayou. It’s time for your state-mandated digital therapy.

Computerfriend is a text-based interactive fiction game by Kit Riemer. 20-60 minute playtime, 6 endings.

name: Boy with Cat
description:
A cat's inquisitive look interferes with the pleasurable sensations of a boy while masturbating.

A game based on the short film Boy With Cat (1966) from Donald Richie.

name: Super Animal Royale: Season 3
description: This is the fifth battle pass. It began on April 5th, 2022 with the release of v1.4.

name: Reversary
description: A short LudumDare game with an interesting premise. A reverse boss battle action platformer where you play the role of adversary. See that big guy? That's you.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - Solo: A Star Wars Story - Character Pack
description: Experience the galaxy with the characters from the prequel "Solo: A Star Wars Story." Play as the young scoundrels and blast your way through the epic saga. The character pack includes: - Han Solo (Young) - Chewbacca (Young) - Lando (Young) - Qi'ra - Tobias Beckett - Enfys Nest

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - The Mandalorian: Season 1 - Character Pack
description: This is the Way. Play as the iconic characters from the hit series The Mandalorian Season 1. Travel around the galaxy as The Mandalorian protecting Grogu at all costs. The character pack includes: - The Mandalorian - Cara Dune - Greef Karga - IG-11 - Kuiil

name: Sickly Victorian Boy
description:
The Vicar of Plagueborogh has a son...a very fragile boy who's constantly at the edge of death. You, the best doctor in Plagueborogh, have the unpleasant task of trying to keep him alive and well. Anyone who takes a look at the unfortunate whelp would agree, you may only be delaying the inevitable...but you must carry on.

Search the house, interview the child for symptoms, and find things to cure him of his ailments before he is gone from this mortal plane.

name: Into the Dead 2: Unleashed
description:
Do whatever it takes to save your family and survive the zombie apocalypse in this ultimate action shooter! How far will you go to make it out alive?

Armed with an arsenal of powerful weapons, you must fend off ever-increasing zombie threats while crossing treacherous terrain. In a world where no one is safe, do what needs to be done to stay alive. Maim, mow down, and eliminate the Dead – anything to keep moving.

name: Graduater
description: Precision platformer game, climbing up the mountain for graduation.

name: The Elder Scrolls Online: High Isle Collector's Edition
description:
A brand-new Elder Scrolls adventure! Experience a world without limits with The Elder Scrolls Online Collection: High Isle CE and get access to the base game, new High Isle Chapter, and all 5 previous Chapters.

Pre-purchase now to begin your adventure immediately in the Base Game or previous Chapters and gain instant access to a Palefrost Elk Mount, plus exclusive bonus CE content at launch.

name: MLB The Show 22: MVP Edition
description: Every pitch. Every hit. Every win. Make your mark and Own the Show in MLB The Show 22.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - Character Collection
description: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga Character Collection includes seven character packs featuring more iconic Star Wars characters: The Mandalorian Seasons 1 & 2, Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, Classic Characters, Solo: A Star Wars Story, Trooper Pack, and Star Wars: The Bad Batch.

name: Mystery Solitaire: Grimm's Tales 5
description: Help Little Red Riding Hood reach her grandmother's house and protect her from the evil gray wolf.

name: Clutter 12: It's About Time - Collector's Edition
description: By far, the most challenging and exciting Clutter ever. Every picture tells part of the story, and the story is of course, About Time!!! Clocks, Spirals & Singletons are worth the price of admission. The very first Clutter Collector's Edition, so you know it's special. Good luck with the Portals!!!

name: Maya Star
description: In a magical land ruled by an ancient evil, a prophecy says that salvation will come with the awakening of a new hero. Explore different maps, fight evil creatures and decide the fate of Maya Star.

name: Fishing Kingdom
description: Fishing Kingdom is a slot-machine style causal fishing game. No need for complex playing skills, just shot fish, win gold and collect treasure, super relaxation, super decompression.

name: Golden Mine Pickaxe 2: Mummy Tombs
description: Golden Mine Pickaxe 2 is a sequel to the sandbox game of the same name with RPG elements. Your hero goes to ancient tombs to find even more gold and new resources. Move deeper into the tombs, upgrade your weapons and defeat new enemies to collect as many resources as possible!

name: Mysperyence
description:
Mysperyence is a coined word that combines the words mystery and experience, and is a VR Murder Mystery game that is played simultaneously by multiple players.

Players dive into the crime scene to "relive" the actions of the characters and gather information such as what the characters were doing at the crime scene and what conversations they were having.

If the players can find the murderer by discussing with each other based on this information, they win the game.

name: Fanite
description: A remake of Magicite, same gameplay loop just a tad bit harder, with new stuff added, but without multiplayer.

name: Letter Bender
description: A spelling-based puzzle game.

name: Healing Simulator
description: Take the role of healer in your party's quest again evil. Manage your party's health with healing spells in this strategy RPG.

name: Easter Bunny
description: Easter Bunny is a 2D top-down stealth action game about an Easter bunny hiding Easter eggs.

name: Shadow Fate
description: Shadow Fate is a modernized, turn-based epic adventure where combat is intricate and challenging but immensely fun and satisfying, relying more on intelligent choices than repetitive grinding.

name: Sigh of the Abyss: Shadow Bonds
description: Embrace the monster within to free yourself from a curse in this dark fantasy visual novel, an introduction to the characters and setting of Sigh of the Abyss.

name: MLB The Show 22
description:
Experience faster, deeper and more intense moment-to-moment match action on the field, with a variety of game modes for all you rookie players and returning seasoned vets.

Every pitch. Every hit. Every win. Make your mark and Own The Show in MLB The Show 22.

name: League of Kingdoms
description: League of Kingdoms is the world's first MMO Strategy game owned & powered by users. On the genesis continent, all lands are owned and governed by you. You can actively own, develop, launch alliance warfares, and earn rewards by contributing to the development of the continent.

name: System Purge
description: ﻿Trapped in a buried, forgotten facility, you must reach the core of an ancient machine to rescue your lost lover. System Purge is a challenging, atmospheric 2D platformer.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition of LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga includes the base game and a Character Collection bundle featuring new playable characters from Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, Solo: A Star Wars Story, The Mandalorian, and Star Wars: The Bad Batch.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga
description:
Lego Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga is a third-person action-adventure with an open world hub. Unlike previous Lego games in which players had to advance through the story in a linear order, players can now choose to start the game from any of the main Skywalker Saga episodes and complete them in any order they wish. Each episode has their own hub filled with planets featured prominently in each respective film that can be visited and explored. Each episode will have five story missions each, a total of 45 levels.

Combat has also been revamped, such as lightsaber fights now involving a variety of combos with light attacks, heavy attacks, and Force moves, and blaster characters having an over-the-shoulder camera angle featured in many third-person shooter games.

Random encounters will also happen in the game's hub. For example, an Imperial Star Destroyer will suddenly jump out of hyperspace and send a fleet of TIE Fighters after the player. Players can choose to engage in dogfights with them or continue onward to progress the story. The game will have more than 200 playable characters, though TT Games has said that number will change.

name: The Living Remain
description: The Living Remain is a virtual reality first person adventure shooter where players immerse themselves in a new world where the undead have taken over. You must survive the horde of undead using an arsenal of weapons in a story driven campaign loaded with a variety of interactive environments.

name: AstroDX
description: AstroDX (Formerly MaipadDX) is a mobile maimai simulator intended for those who do not yet have access to a cabinet, those who want to practice, and everyone interested in maimai who otherwise could not play the arcade game.

name: Lucky Pikinini: Zombie Rampage
description: First-Person Linear Story-Telling Game, 7 Chapter 6 Hours Long Story, Verde Diamente Presidente Francisco Antonio Rodriguez Mobilizes La National Policia And Defense Force To Combat An Outbreak Of Zombies, Calling For The Manhunt, Arrest And Prosecution Of 3 Scientists Who Made The Outbreak

name: Adelie: Chasing Pavements
description:
Survive being chased by a rolling snowball with a crafty penguin.

Pickup, combine, and throw objects to delay the snowball’s inevitable descent! Throwing objects at the snowball chips away at its continually growing volume, while throwing them at other objects can craft tools to better suit your survival.

name: Keysmasher Ultimate
description: Sin descripción

name: We Need To Talk
description: Try to avoid the conversation! Use every move you got and every answer you can find to delay these - you assume - terrible news!

name: The Epic Quest of Birdo The Pink Dinosaur
description:
Play as Birdo the pink dinosaur and help her free yoshi from the evil wart, who is trying to cook yoshi´s eggs!
Travel through the world and defeat SMB1,SMB2 and SMB3 characters. Drive on a rollercoaster, jump around in space and visit wart´s personal swamp. Buy something from the shop to make you more powerfull! Find secrets in every level. And defeat the bosses from SMB2, who have sworn themself against birdo.

name: The Railroad to Elsewhere
description:
This train doesn't stop.

You find yourself traveling somewhere inside a run-down railroad car. You know you have to get off at some point, but still – you do everything in your power just to stay a little bit longer. The conductor is watching your every step. He knows who you truly are.
Where is this train really headed?

name: Hyacinth
description: Hyacinth is a psychological horror game that centers on Neo(they/them) after they find themselves alone on a strange train. Follow them as they navigate through surreal train car after surreal train car... and try to find their way home.

name: Will There Bee Another?
description: You are Bee, a girl that it's on an online date with Mel. The date is almost over, but Bee doesn't wanna end it... Can you find the correct words to delay this date a little more, or even get a second date?

name: Touch Theory
description:
Oh, I'm crying now, authentic tears,
They flow out of me when I think about you,
Cause you're the only person in the world who'd understand,
Cause you're the only person in the world who'd understand the meaning of this!

name: Date Us, You Won't
description:
You're at the University's annual festival and somehow got dragged into participating in a dating booth. Since you're here now, might as well go for the ride, right?

Join our wacky OCs for silly jokes and simple chit-chat.

This game is meant to be a small interactive experience for you and these characters. There is no big arching story, just a conversation between two people who have just met!

name: Different Strokes
description: A collaborative online painting game where players can create, edit, and rate each other's art!

name: OpenGoal: Jak and Daxter - The Precursor Legacy
description: A full-on fan-made PC port of Jak and Daxter: The Precursor Legacy, with added options like resolution, camera, antialiasing, and more.

name: Special Agent CyberDuck
description: Special Agent CyberDuck is an action-packed pixel art platformer. CyberDuck and his team of Special Agents must run, jump and shoot their way through levels of fast-paced, explody mayhem. Defeat the minions, rescue the hostages, dodge obstacles, figure-out puzzle elements and ultimately confront GODBOT to beat the game! Then do it again on Suicide mode! Are you up for the challenge?

name: Procrabstination
description:
Spend time exploring and interacting with the many things in your room in Procrabstination! Play hit games including Crabby Clicker, CRAB WARS and FINAL CRABTASY, read a steamy romance novel, browse memes, listen to the radio and so much more!

There's plenty to do today, what's first on your agenda?

name: Someone Stole My Lunch!
description: A short comedy visual novel about your lunch and a thief... both of which are hot.

name: Claim your Free BitBuddy Today!
description: "BitBuddy" is a virtual pet raising game. When you quit, your BitBuddy will die.

name: No More Regrets
description: A young upper-class boy discovers he is about to die. Since all his life he bullied everyone around him, in order to have God's forgiveness, he decides to go after the people he has wronged and apologize.

name: Outlander
description: Outlander is a blocky platformer game that is fun for all ages.

name: Merge Hero
description: An idle RPG game with infinite possibilities. Merge items, upgrade stats and fight deadly monsters and bosses

name: Fill & Cross: Royal Riddles
description: Solve the king's puzzles and gain access to his treasures! Solve 108 unique puzzles in 9 elegant locations.

name: Pirate Solitaire 2
description: Play the new Pirate Solitaire right on the shores of Britain! Outplay seasoned sea dogs. Prove that you're the best of the best!

name: Die Die Die and Try
description: A simple runner where you have to dodge obstacle and finish as fast as possible.

name: Past Synergy
description: Past Synergy is a 2 player co-op game that tests you and your friend's synergy. Divide the ability and roles between you and your friend to overcome the obstacles in a cave that appears in your dream every night.

name: A Butterfly's Dream
description: Be a Butterfly in this beautiful and relaxing game with no goals or enemies. Based on a Zen tale.

name: Hare Apparent
description: An ancient custom is invoked, and five kingdoms send their young heirs to play a legendary game. Build relationships, form alliances, and win the crown in this high-stakes game of woodland politics and social maneuvering.

name: Knightblade
description: A retro open world RPG, farming sim, and dungeon crawler. Knightblade is best described as an open world fantasy game mixed with farming and life sim elements, as if it were made in the golden age of video games. Create your character, and explore the sandbox while solving a mystery.

name: Sakura Succubus 5
description: The fifth instalment of the Sakura Succubus series. Hifumi is invited to a European country by its Japanophile princess, Stephania, and she brings Hiroki, Hazel, and Marina along with her. Stephania takes an interest in Hiroki, and a new romance story unfolds.

name: Transcendence Legacy: Voidswept
description: Uncover the truth behind a world plagued by monstrosities. Traverse through mysterious ruins to search for the answer with dependable allies at your side.

name: A Ghostly Rose
description: Edmund is entrapped in a most terrible Web. He must punch and kick his way through all sorts of terrors in this turn-based RPG. An emotional and surreal roller-coaster. Edmund will do anything to see her again. One last time.

name: Penelope's Odyssey
description: Penelope's Odyssey is an adventure-platfomer game where you play as Penelope, an orphaned pet rat. Use your unique sense of smell to navigate the maze of a post apocalyptic city, collect memories of your owner and eventually escape to freedom.

name: Kuroi Tsubasa
description: Meet Kureha Kurono and her friends in this charming visual novel! With the help of the devil Blackwing-chan they'll be able to defeat the evil shadow, right? What was that? It was Blackwing himself who caused this mess? Oh dear, oh dear.

name: ShapeGrid
description: Shapegrid is a casual puzzle game. Find your way through different shapes and colors. Play 70+ levels or compete against other players in endless mode.

name: Dashing Dodgems
description: A split-screen multiplayer game where you and up to three other friends control a bumper car and try to bump eachother off the maps!

name: Shadow Era
description:
As the first full-scale trading card game on mobile, Shadow Era has had a long history of innovation. The gorgeous card art, balanced gameplay and cross-platform accounts quickly earned it a place as one of the best indy card games.

With the release of Shadow Tokens, ownership of the game was given to the players, with the opportunity to receive great rewards.

name: Elden Ring: Reforged
description: A thorough revision of ELDEN RING's balance and mechanics. Covers enemies, boss fights, hitboxes, animations, equipment, the camera, and more. Includes many new gameplay mechanics to add to the ELDEN RING experience.

name: DeckHex
description: Sin descripción

name: Elden Ring Reforged
description: ELDEN RING Reforged (ERR) is a mod by Kirnifr and ivi, with assistance from Poeconcept, Hanalove and Cavou. ERR is a thorough revision of ELDEN RING's balance and mechanics. The mod covers enemies, boss fights, hitboxes, animations, equipment, the camera, and more. Main features include unique camera parameters for boss fights, improved enemy hitboxes, reworked scaling and leveling, a new Runeforging system to encourage open world exploration and make NG+ more rewarding, changed gameplay mechanics that fix many of the vanilla game's issues, new Spells and Weapons, and more!

name: Block Blast!
description:
Block Blast! A perfect mix of block and jigsaw puzzle games, combining creativity with the classics! The simple control, wonderful sound effects, and a great rhythm! Block Blast will leave you wanting more!

Aside from the classical block puzzle games, you will also experience a whole new original COMBO gameplay. Drag and drop block puzzles onto the board to fill a row or column to complete elimination and clearing multiple rows or columns at once will produce a cool elimination animation as well as extra points. The more COMBOs you perform, the more points you get in a block puzzle game. It is up to your logical skills and layout strategy if you want to score high points. Test your IQ and exercise your brain in a block puzzle game!

name: Block Blast!
description: "Block Blast!" is a free and popular block puzzle game that is your best choice when you want to pass the casual time and challenge your brain. The goal of this block puzzle game is easy yet fun: match and clear as many colored blocks as possible on the board. Mastering the skill of filling rows or columns will make the block puzzle game easier. "Block Blast!" not only provides a relaxing and cozy puzzle gaming experience but also enhances your logical abilities and trains your brain.

name: Anomaly Report
description: Anomaly Report is a brand-new 33-level megawad for vanilla Doom 2.

name: Engineer's Last Stand
description:
You've been left alone to delay the inevitable death by the alien horde with your turret building skills. Place turrets and dodge the monsters to survive as long as you can in this satisfying action game.

Created in FTE QuakeWorld engine in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 50.

name: Balance The Stick
description: Sin descripción

name: Soak 'Em Out
description: Soak ‘Em Out is an endless score attack game that takes heavy influence from the Game & Watch Gallery series. You play as Tina, a cat trying to catch a bus that unfortunately is taking an unusually long time to arrive. To make matters worse, a big storm is brewing! With no true shelter nearby and only an umbrella to take cover with, how long are you able to delay the inevitable before getting soaked out?

name: I'm On a Watcher Duty 2: Paranormal in Gensokyo
description: A sequel to the first "I'm on a watcher duty". This time, it takes place in Gensokyo. Enjoy.

name: One Direction Heardle
description: A clone of Heardle, but for One Direction (group) songs. Each 1D Heardle is a randomly chosen song.

name: Baseball: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - 4 Player Cooperation Edition: Challenge Mode
description: Sin descripción

name: Soccer: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
description: Sin descripción

name: Hyper//Echo
description: Hyper//Echo is a web-based “zone” where players are invited to explore the virtual space, and leave something behind — namely buildings and messages for other players to discover. Over the course of the 3-month exhibition, these artefacts gradually decay (buildings become ruins, messages appear as “broken links”) and become overgrown. Players are encouraged to return to “maintain” their and others’ buildings, as they eventually become irreparable if left abandoned for too long.

name: Crux: The Great Outdoors
description: Climbing is about carefully planning your route and flawless execution. In Crux you move your hands or feet to a new hold - but each hold will only let you hang on for so long. Find the sequence of moves that get you to the top and execute them! And when you've reached all the tops - beat the highscores by finishing each climb in the fewest possible moves.

name: 1001 Jigsaw: Earth Chronicles 7
description: 1001 photos of our fantastic planet! Discover the breathtaking beauty of our world alongside 1001 Jigsaw: Earth Chronicles 7!

name: Murasame
description: Murasame is an RPG that mixes in romantic comedy. There are laughter, tears, and a little sadness combined. Here comes the slapstick fantasy love-comedy RPG!

name: Zemblanity
description: Zemblanity is an atmospheric first-person horror game. What seemed like a little creepy invitation over from an old childhood friend turns into disturbing uncovering of mysterious forces ruling in the mansion. Will you find a way out?
